reviewText:
I thought I had reviewed this, but Amazon asked for a review again, so here I am.

Pros.  I really like the 32 Degrees Weatherpoof shirts.  I have both the blue and this set.

They wear well, fit perfectly and are just extremely comfortable.  I've been replacing my premium cotton t-shirts with them (having bought the upgraded cotton to replace normal t-shirts before).

Cons.  The fabric on the black is a different weave and a different blend from the gray.  I already knew that (since I have the long sleeve versions). I like both blends and weaves.  However, it can be a surprise if you are not expecting it.

Costco used to carry them.  All Costco has now is a few small in blue that they are remaindering.  This is now the only source I could find when I wanted more than the two blue ones I have.
summary: I really like the 32 Degrees Weatherpoof shirts

I love, love, love this shirt.  I got so many compliments when I wore this!  It's a very soft and comfortable material.  It's well made and stitched.  The shirt fit perfectly to size too.  The lace adds a lovely touch of style and keeps you cool at the same time.  I decided to pair this shirt with a pair of black leggings, though it would look great with jeans too.  I didn't need to add jewelry because it was dressy enough without it because of the lace and cut of the shirt.  The cut is perfect.  It flows nicely yet contours to your figure as you move.  This shirt is offered in two color choices.  I went with the pinkish tone.

I bought this dress to wear as a tunic with leggings while I'm pregnant, and then to be able to wear it as a dress once I get back to pre-baby size after pregnancy. This dress works perfectly for that, so I'm very happy with how versatile it is! It fits true to size, not too tight in the arms, and has a good amount of stretch to the gray material. I am 37 weeks pregnant with twins 155lbs and I'm 5"7, I got a size small and this fits me just like a tunic would right now. I love the neutral colors and the 3/4 length sleeves. The crochet on the arms is a beautiful touch that makes it versatile in being casual/dressy depending on what you pair it with. The material of the shirt itself is fairly thin, which is good for me currently because I get hot a lot being pregnant, but I would not recommend putting this in the dryer ever. It definitely needs to be hung dry. Also, after washing it before wearing it for the first time, some of the stitching on the crocheted part came loose and had to be tied and cut, so make sure you are washing this on a very gentle cycle. Other than that I love this dress/tunic and think it's a fair price for what you're getting!

There are two colors to choose to, I got mine in grey and it looks really nice, I can wear it at work or even in a semi casual occasion,also Casual,Beach, Party.

The first time I wash it by hand with cold water and hang it to dry. However this clothes is machine washable and can be tumbled dry.

Excellent fit, beautiful look and somewhat unusual to wear, but not at all uncomfortable.  My package arrived quick from China, but buyer beware the package has a customs label stating package content.  I have to laugh, I think my mailman thinks I have some kind of underwear fetish as I have received a few pair here lately.  Now about the pair that I received.  I ordered the white, black stripe with red thigh bands.  I ordered a large after reading some of the reviews and they fit great.  If your looking at the model you can see his manhood centered and very noticeable.  Mine sits and is positioned just like the model and the seam of my jeans rubbed that material and the material stitch work broke slightly after only about 8 hours of wear.  During the day the red thigh band rolled up and did not remain positioned, which was not uncomfortable.  When the thigh bands rolled up they rolled up evenly.  Where the white and black strips meet there is a thick seam and a seam across back in the same location and a seam running up and down the thighs.  Now here is where the unusual to wear comes in.  When the red thigh band rolls up from sit to stand and normal movement the seam in the front middle moves up allow the penis to hold sideways mine always went right.  This was not uncomfortable but a unique feeling and makes your penis noticeable under your pants/jeans etc..  I went to the store and was at the check out and the cashier was crotch shopping and once I got outside I noticed this unusual positioning sure had me exposed.  I am so glad he was able to enjoy himself and I was very happy with the great customer service.  The material is very soft and stretches around my body excellent.  I washed them twice without issue and yes I would buy other pairs.
summary: Excellent fit with an unusal wear

reviewText:
I love this beautiful little purse. I got the baby blue purse and it is a beautiful color. It is very well made with good strong stitching so you can overstuff this bag if you want without worry about the seams bursting. One thing I noted right away was the nice thick black material that lines the inside of the bag - I note this because Ive noticed that other purses Ive bought lately have really cheap and thin plasticky lining. The lining in this purse is a thick linen time material. So nice!

This purse is made of real leather - if you put your nose up against it, youll know it. The surface is gorgeous its bumpy yet soft. The purse has a decorative buckle on the front flap. I love that you don't have to deal with the buckle because the flap closes with a very well-attached magnetic snap. The magnet is strong and does not release by itself even if the purse is very full. If you want extra security, the inside has a zipper closure. The zipper is also well-attached and high-quality. The inner wall of the purse has a small zippered pocket which is perfect for stashing credit cards, money, and other small items. The outside of the purse has two pockets. There one on the front is an open pocket that is covered by the flap when closed.  On the back is a zippered pocket to allow easy access for small items such as a set of keys.

I see that others have posted nice pictures, so I am just adding one more. My iPhone 5S is in the front pocket and I have a regular black pen laying in front so that you have a size reference. Its a pretty small purse, but youll be surprised by how much it will hold.

The quality and look of this purse is on par with some upscale brands. Ive had this purse for nearly two weeks and Ive chosen it over my so called designer bags quite a few times now. If you are looking for a cute little purse, you will definitely love this!  I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. All opinions are based on my own experience and observations.

reviewText: This is a great wallet.  It has plenty of room for cards (two separate sections, one large one small on opposite sides), a large coin pure and room for cash and receipts.  It has two closure snaps in case the wallet is crammed full of stuff and you need extra room.  The shiny tooled leather is gorgeous and quite thick, so the wallet will wear well.  This wallet can also be used a small clutch.  It also has an outside pocket for those items you want to keep within easy reach.  It has a clear window for a driver's license as well.  The Amazon price is much less than I paid in a department store ($190).  The quality of the leather is great and on par with Coach or other mid price brand.  I really like this wallet and will enjoy using it for years to come.  If you want a retro style wallet that's a bit off the beaten path, you can't do better than this Patricia Nash style.  I'm impressed by the quality, which I would have expected from a much more pricey brand but not one so reasonably priced.  This wallet will last for years and will likely not show wear at all.  It's the perfect size for all my myriad stuff and it's easy to find exactly what I need.  I highly recommend it.

The socks look great, felt great out of the package.  Love the design.  These were the plus points.
The minuses - I could not get the sock over my heel - at first...  I eventually did but I forced it too far as I heard a loud ripping sound.  There were no visible rips, just the sound.  On the second sock - same thing.  I could not get it over my heel.  My feet are normal - size 10 feet, these are for size 7-12.  I pulled the socks up as high as possible - they were about two inches lower than any other crew sock I own.  I should have seen the "low to mid-calf" portion in the description.  They are definitely more toward the lower size.  The reinforced heel - that was not even close to centered on my heel - but more toward the toe.
I think the bottom line is that they are too small.  Child sized yes - adult sized - nope.  Cannot wear these - not worth my time to return them - lost money.
summary: Too small on an average sized foot.

So, I was surfing around Amazon several months ago, looking for clothing that resembled some lines I had seen on TV shopping channels. I happened on Alexander+David and the rest is history. I am smitten with this line, each piece at least as exciting if not more so than the last, all of them adding so much character and verve to my wardrobe. The tops elevate whatever outfit I pair them with, so chic. These are not the baggy, shapeless tops that you might think. They are so well executed, the fit and proportion are superb. Sigh, sigh......I want every A+D item, and more than one of some of them. I almost forgot to mention the price and the value--very affordable and the value is tremendous. I wear a 10-12, broad-shouldered, 34-36D. Medium fits great. If you have heavyset arms, the sleeves may be too snug. I have long, lean arms, so no problems for me.

I received this bracelet directly from the manufacturer at no cost for evaluation during the product's launch, and here are my observations. This platinum plated stamped 925 sterling silver bracelet is smooth, brightly polished and beautiful with its sparkling cubic zirconia encrusted bead shaped snap clasp closure. It's beautiful enough to be worn without adding any charms at all, but it does have the same diameter as a Pandora bracelet, so any charm that fit a Pandora bracelet will fit this one as well, and unlike a plain sterling silver bracelet, this one won't ever tarnish. To open the clasp, you push your nail into the crack on the sparkling snap clasp bead, and it pops right open. I keep my nails on the shorter side, so this isn't a problem for me. Once you add beads to your bracelet be sure to add a bead stopper or a clip charm to keep your beads from dropping off when you open the bracelet. To close the bracelet again just insert the end and push the clasp back together over the end, but don't stop until you hear it click shut. Once it has clicked shut it is very secure and even tugging on the bracelet won't make it pop open.
summary: Platinum plated so it won't ever tarnish

I (husband) purchased BOTH versions the $35 first and then the $55 version. Although some of the review were not as clear as I liked as to what gun fit what holster, I decided to try the lower priced version first.

I am using this belt in a fan film, so I did not have to have the $200+ pro versions made by 3rd party vendors so I decided to try this brand. I added pictures for those who are looking for a Han Solo belt for their cosplay.  I only wanted to post the pictures with a '95 Han Solo Blaster and a Rubies Han Solo Blaster to give you scale of the fit.

The $35 holster was lower in quality and I could not fit any of the two blasters without any type of modification of the holding strap. The buckle is a hard painted PVC. I was not satisfied with the overall product and will return.

The $55 holster was higher in quality and had the greeble holders and I could fit both blasters easily. The buckle is metal.

I'm a 38" waist and the $55 holster fit with one hole to spare and the leg straps were long enough to all me to secure.

Hope this helps others! (NOTE prices I quoted in my review were when purchased and could change)

Holster part was snug, but the model is a dude and I'm a lady with wide hips, so there's that, but the product arrived broken but I got a free replacement. The seller is amazing with customer service and gave me multiple coupons/discounts for future purchases. Awesome product!!! I own a Solo belt and a separate one with a holster that works! :D
Product was EXACTLY what I needed - could not have found a better "Han Solo" costume prop!
summary: The key to making your Han Solo costume perfect.

reviewText: It paired great my costume. This was the only thing I could not make myself. The material is fantastic.

Those small items in the belt that Han Solo is wearing on the movies are not present (but it was not advertised that there are part of it) so I have to find them somewhere else. Anyway, I recommend this belt (the more expensive variant), it fits me nicely.

Be very VERY careful purchasing premade accessories to complete this belt. I tore the "cannister" holster trying to get it to fit. The leather is not that tough. Also, the Nerf Han Solo Water Blaster I bought doesn't quite fit either.

Also, I'm glad I'm skinny. I don't know how this fits on larger-sized individuals. I can barely get the thigh strap around my leg and secured.

That all said, I like it. It will complete my Han Solo cosplay outfit.

When I buy a piece of jewelry, I wear it until it falls off my body. I should have saved my money and bought the real deal (the miansai silver cuff) as this one is a sorry alternative. This product is in no way a knock off mind you, I cant even say which came first (it doesn't matter but I think the miansai one did). the difference though is in the QUALITY and CRAFTSMANSHIP. this cuff is gold plated. fine. the plating comes off pretty quickly, and that not a huge deal, thats what happens with plated jewelry. One big problem however is when the "stainless steel" underneath starts rusting. I know where are different grades of stainless and all but I expected better stainless then this. the cuff itself, (the horseshoe shape and threaded pin) are very thick. I can not say that I felt that this product was comfortable, as it was heavy, thick, cumbersome, and tight. if the thickness of the bracelet was thinner it would have fit better. if it was thinner, maybe they could have sprung for better stainless. I am a large 6'5" man and for me to think that this thing looked too thick/chunky and was too tight might not mean the same thing to you, and maybe you just want this as a costume piece for the occasional going out. maybe the small or medium size are more appropriately proportioned. I cant say. all I can say is that this wasn't for me.

I was really anticipating the arrival of this monokini, and now that it finally arrived, after twenty days, I could not be more disappointed with this item.
Here is the list of grievances:
The monokini is crocheted from one end to the other, which makes it see-through everywhere, including the hiney and the boobs.  There is only a small piece of double-up right at the crotch area.
The butt cheeks don't fit into the pants part, as about 2 inches of my crack are sticking out, no matter how I try to pull up on it. Looking at the picture where the model shows her back side, you can see how she pulled the panties into her butt, way up to manage to cover the crack. I am not into wedgies, so that would not be a viable option for me.
The boobs are not supported at all, as the brassiere part is just knitted, not shaped. The padding insert is off-white, not black, which would make it look better. One can see the padding through the knitwear. Also, this model on the pic must have boobs made in Siliconia, as they stand up like no natural breast of that size ever would. So, if you have natural breasts, expect them to slide out of the cups, unless you tie that thin string underneath so fast in the back that you can't breathe well anymore. I am a cup C size, and the cups of the one I got are barely covering up, they are about one third smaller than shown in this picture.
The middle part is crocheted so loosely that it can pull out to double its length without much effort. I suspect that in the water, it will stretch out even more! (I did not want to make it wet, so I did not test this, but I'm willing to take a gamble on this hypothesis, lol).
I could imagine that this concept might work, if they had made the top and bottom of regular swimwear material, and only made the middle part in crochet.
The tie strings around the neck and in the back are just a very thin crochet cord, and the ends are already fraying. These will unravel in no time. And because they are so thin, they cut especially into the neck, and just a little less in the back. I can only imagine that this will get worse when the skin gets wet and softens up. Chafing is waiting to happen!  I added a pic of the frayed end of the tie cord. The other three ends look just like this one. On the second pic, I also am showing how you can see my fingers through the knitwear on the butt area.
The swim suit is going back as soon as I get the label printed. If my review was helpful to you, thanks for letting me know!
summary: Everything is wrong with this one!!!

Let me start the review by stating that I returned this dress in two sizes - 16 and 18W - both were too small.

The craftsmanship of the dress was very good!  Fully lined with a built-in bra makes the dress a little stiff in the bodice, but it would be easy to sacrifice a little comfort to not have to wear a bra.

The sizing runs a little smaller than posted on the site since these are made in China (I didn't realize that when I ordered).  Make SURE you communicate with the Seller at the time of your order.  They will custom make a dress for you if you send them your measurements on their form.  Unfortunately I did not realize this when I ordered and so I ordered two different sizes (16 & 18W).  The "stock" sizes arrived and they were WAY too small.

After communicating with the Seller, I opted to return the dresses at my cost ($50!!).  They did suggest to have someone in the US alter the dresses,  however because they were too small, it was not worth the additional cost.

Bottom line?  Seller worked well with me regarding the return/credit and the quality of the dress was very good.
Lesson Learned?  Check the country of Origin (where it's coming from), return policy and ask the Seller if they take your measurements.
summary: Good quality; affordable price; Seller communicates timely - Ultimately Returned/Too Small

The measurements provided are inaccurate and the dress is too small in the bust and shoulders, but I ordered the largest size and can still wear it comfortably with a few buttons undone at the top.  The cut of the dress is very cute and flattering and I received 3 different compliments on the dress the first day I wore it to work.  However, the dress came with only a tag saying "XL"--no brand name, listing of what the fabric is, or care instructions.  The product description says, "Material :cotton blend,soft,stretch," but there is no stretch to the fabric at all and it feels like a rough unwashed linen or possibly even a potato sack.  Washing it once in a delicates bag and hanging it to dry did not make the fabric any softer.  There are also a bunch of loose threads that I had to chop off.

That said, I decided to keep the dress as I have not seen another with quite the same cut or that will fit over my frame (currently 98cm, 94 cm, 104cm, shoulders 37cm) - usually US size 10 in tops and 12-14 in bottoms.  The length of the dress varies; I like to wear the dress with leggings shorts underneath for modesty at work as it falls mid thigh (I'm 5'7).

A great thing about the dress is that it can also be worn just as a button shirt as it unbuttons all the way down.  If you are OK with the fabric but worried about sizing around the bust and shoulders the dress can be worn open as a shirt.
summary: A beautifully cut, undersized potato sack -- but I still wear it

This was my first purchase of a bra-sized tankini, and I was not disappointed. First, if you have never bought a bra-sized ranking, be aware that they are difficult to put on. There is an actual built-inbra in this one, with three rows of hooks. I ended up pulling it over my head, spinning it around, flipping the top down (very hard to do), then spinning it around again, pulling up and adjusting.

 I typically wear a 32H in Panache bras, but went with a 34GG because I wasn't sure how a 32 would fit the rest of my body (I wear a 10/12 in clothes).

The cups do cut in a little at the top, but that might just be my personal shape. The cups give a nice rounded shape. The 34 fit the rest of my body well, and is so long I don't have to worry about creep-up; with the ties adjusted all the way down it comes down to my thighs (I'm 5'5"). The dark color and pattern work to camouflage any lumps, bumps and rolls.

This top fit everything I was looking for: a bra-sized suit that is appropriate for the community pool with my kids, but isn't too "old".

I received this at a discount for an honest review

This was purchased as a unique piece to wear out for parties, etc, with groups that appreciate novel beauty. I love the concept and was very excited to get it, but I found the wire chosen for wrapping the glow-in-the-dark stones was so thick and woven so closely that it was difficult to see the glow. Either a thinner wire or half the wraps would make this more likely to be worn, at least for me. I do wire wrapping, so I may rewrap the stones and see if I can find a balance between structural integrity and appearance I likeI received this piece at a reduced price in return for an honest and unbiased review.
Added 5/15/16 - This company has shown excellent attention to customer service, checking on delivery and satisfaction. While I chose not to change my review based on adjustments after receiving the product at a discount, their willingness to offer to correct any issues and to ensure satisfaction is among the best service I've received.
summary: Interesting concept, missed the mark for me, excellent service attention

Its made out of a nice medium weight cotton blend and the black is a true black  not one of those weird inky brown blacks. Its also very soft and very drapey. It was a bit wrinkled when it arrived but all it needed was a hangar and a few spritzes of water to smooth it out overnight.

I usually don't wear tops with peek-a-boo shoulders but this one actually looks really nice and has longer sides than front, which I like better than hi-low styles. I noticed another reviewer received one that was thin enough to need something under it but the one I received is a nice decent weight that doesnt require any type of tank top or camisole. Maybe the fabric on the other color option is slightly different.

I have now machine washed my top once with other dark items using detergent for dark laundry and it looks as good as new. No fading. I did hang it on a hangar to dry and that was perfect  no wrinkles or any crinkling.  I won't be putting this in the dryer ever as I have found that dark items suffer more under high heat than lighter colored garments.

What else can I say, its a beautiful, well-made top for casual wear.

Recommend.

I do not often write negative reviews, but this was just too awful. I love the idea of this sleeveless blouse. Unlike other reviews, I love the shorter length of this because it shows off my hips. But it was cut so poorly that it was lop-sided! So the lengthiest part fell towards my right hip rather than straight down. Moreover, it was so large in the shoulders and arm holes that my bra was showing. What should have been an elegant flowy blouse became a slutty display of cleavage and undergarments. If it came in xxsmall or xsmall, I might try it again in the hope that I received the only lop-sided one. For reference, I am 5'1" tall, my bust measures 33", waist 24", hips 35".

Update: I did not return this as it was so inexpensive. I decided instead to alter it. I took out the shoulder seams and shortened the shoulder straps nearly two inches. It still hangs a bit to the right, which is irritating, but the back is adorable and the front is classy and cute and no longer a cleavage fest. Moreover, my bra doesn't show on the sides anymore. A great improvement. I will say that this is a super comfortable and versatile blouse now.

reviewText: Arrived on time, not crushed fits beautifully

I was disappointed at first because it wasn't wool, but after wearing the hat a bit, I like it!  It's not as soft as wool, but it looks very nice and will probably stay looking the same a long time as it is a cotton/polyester mix.  It comes in a nice, clear plastic zip-bag, suitable for storing the hat when not being used..  I ordered a camel one before, and am now ordering another one in black.  If they offered white, I might get another, as the price, even with the shipping cost, is very cheap for this nice looking hat.  FYI, I am not associated with this company, but feel obligated to give a positive review, as when I ordered it before, it didn't include the word, simulated, in the description, so I was fully expecting wool, and marveling at the price,  When I saw the cotton/poly in the label, I complained, and got an immediate and complete refund along with an extremely sweet and apologetic message, telling me to keep the hat, no charge, and not to be unhappy.  Then I tried the hat out and it was okay, even nice, and looked so good... I felt ashamed for complaining so fiercely,  It is a nice hat, not wool, but looks sorta like it...  And for $13 with shipping, it is a great deal if you need a cheap hat.  :)
summary: Not wool, but a good deal on a good hat

Were going on vacation next week and its bright, colorful, and adorable and would hide my tummy a bit, or at least distract from it with the detail of the suit. Sadly it ran really smallat least two sizes too small. If I had more time I could lose twenty pounds and get into it (which I will do because Im dying to wear it to the pool and beach this summer even if I won't be able to get into it in time for vacation) but its not at a size I can wear now. Im true to size, as they say, I know my body fits the size I ordered, so its the suit that was made too small, not me ordering the wrong size.

The suit is adorable, the tassels may be better for tanning or lounging than swimming because they tangle easily as I found out while putting it on, but they're pretty and the suit is well made and gorgeous.

Order a size or two too big, youll love this suit.

However once you get past that obstacle the suit is very comfortable and very flattering. I found that the suit hid all of the things that you want to hide in a bathing suit after kids and weight gain. It allows for some of your silhouette to show through the tassels, but not too much. Also there is a drawstring on the side that allows for you to pull the suit legs up or down for more of a bikini cut or a boy cut on the leg. Also the halter fit allows for more support for the chest. I think that the suit is perfectly decorative all on its own so you don't have to wear a necklace. And I love that the suit has little touches of flare everywhere to Jazz it up and make it a good looking outfit for swimming. I think this suit is well worth the investment.

reviewText:
This is one hard to review dress - in my eyes it equally has potential and some flaws.
Now - for me - it works alright, after I figured out how to wear it in a way I feel comfortable with.

Sure, I'd love more fullness and "drama" in the skirt part and a little less sheer, but I really love the backless portion of it, the airiness of the whole dress and how it flows gently when you walk. And the color is so very pretty.

The slits are quite high (I wear shorts with it) and while the top portion is lined, the skirt part is not - and it is see through. Again, though, with shorts I don't have issues at all with this detail.
I wear it with a low back, long line strapless bra and it works quite well in terms of not taking away anything from the backless look. I tried also with a bralette with some lace on the back and it is pretty as well.
I bought the large and it feels very comfortable around the waist and on the chest area. As per the length, it reaches just past my ankles.

In the end, if you are not expecting a runway dress, I think there may be chances that you may like the dress as well - but, on the other hand, I'm not sure it is a kind of dress that can work for everybody.

As reference, I'm 5'4", 125 pounds and 36B.

You get what you pay for. You could find higher quality sunglasses at any KMart/Walmart/Etc.

These are knockoffs of the Dior So Real sunglasses that whattheirfaces wore - so they're popular. I tried on the Dior So Real sunglasses and they were ugly as hell AND 400-500$ They are 'different' though, which is the gimmick. If you have money to blow - get the real thing. If you're like me and work for a living, get the knockoffs. The 'lenses' will not pop out - they are stapled into the frame itself and don't even rest in the bottom eyewire - so if you think you can switch out colors, nope! Also, you have to have a narrow face to get these puppies on - they are small.

The ones I bought were the blue mirror/grey ones and they'll probably stay in my car since they're ARE polarized. The transition line does get into your field of vision, but since I lean my head back while driving, it doesn't interfere. They do block UV.
summary: Ok for the price. They are polarized and block UV.

This is a very simple yet pretty top.  It looks great casual, paired with jeans and will also look perfect business casual with nice black pants and a unique belt.  I love the pink.  The material is soft and stretchy and therefore tends to be a little bit clingy, but not clingy enough to make it awkward or uncomfortable.  Because the material is soft and light weight, it borders on feeling a bit sheer.  I wore it with a light cami underneath and everything was fine.  That also helped with the clingy factor.  The selection of colors is great and I cant wait to add a few more to my wardrobe!
Disclosure:  I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

I was anxious to love this top. It's really cute in the picture & the trapeze shape would be great for my pear-shaped body. The hips did fit great! And even the bust. But above the bust and the sleeves were WAY too tight! I'd never had anything fit like this before! Although a good quality fabric with rich color, it is also VERY thin. Hugs every bra seam, mole, and fold, even in areas it's not too tight. This fabric would be better as a double-layer style.

I got this at a discount in exchange for an honest review. Unfortunately, I had to return it.

First of all this is a very cute top when wearing it. It fits like a glove to the top of the bust line then flows down into a traditional swing top.  The picture shows plenty of room in the arms and upper body but I did not find that to be so. As a chesty woman I found the shoulders and upper bust fit more like a leotard than a roomy shirt, but the rest of the top fit like the image in the photo. Could be just me, but I suspect the model is wearing one size larger than her usual size. If you want a looser fit order up. It has plenty of length, hitting about mid thigh and covering the rear completely.
The fabric is mostly rayon with some added spandex which should make the top maintain it's shape. It is thin but not sheer, but if I wear it out I am fairly certain I will wear a camisole beneath it. Also pay attention to the washing instructions.  Rayon can be a little unforgiving if cared for incorrectly

I am in a quandary about this top. It looks very nice (even though it is form fitting at the very top) and I might possibly wear it during the fall, but I live in the deep south and rayon is just too hot for our muggy summer.  Maybe if we have a cool night I might be able to pull it off?  Meanwhile I think it will just hang out in my closet

I received this at a discount for my honest unbiased review. I count on reviews to help me decide if I will purchase an item or not, so I am leaving my honest opinion.

I love the longer, flowing tunic tops.  They look great with leggings and tighter fitting jeans and are so forgiving.  I have many different variations, and AMIE Finery Luxury Full Drape Swing Tunic Top is the most comfortable one I have.  It is so soft and feels so goon on the skin.  It isn't too heavy, actually quite the opposite, so can be worn in warmer weather.  These tops can be dressed up or dressed down and look great either way.  The loose fit is great for hiding those problem areas.  I ordered it in the Tomato Red and it is so gorgeous.  I am definitely purchasing more of these!

*I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.

I bought this top because I liked the combination of the 3/4 length sleeves and the color.  I ordered mine in pink, which is usually considered a summer color, and you don't usually see it in warmer clothes.  I also liked the tunic style and the loose fitting over the torso.

  This material is a stretchy fabric - 95% rayon and 5% spandex.  It is very soft and comfortable.  The style allows the tunic to flow freely. The tunic (size medium) is 68 inches long along the back seam.  The sleeves are 42 inches long from the shoulder. It washes well,  The label says to hand wash and lay flat.  I did this and had no wrinkles.  I have some other clothes made of the same combination of fabric and I always put them in the washer, so the next time I wash this, it will go in the washer and I will edit this review based on the results.

  The only problem I have is with the sleeves. They are very snug. The questions and answers on this  Amazon listing said it ran larger than usual. I am 5' 3" and 120 pounds and wear a small or medium, so I ordered the medium size. Even with a medium, I found that I have to carefully line up the seam on the sleeve to the underside of my arm.  Otherwise, it twists around the shoulder and looks bad.  I'm still giving this top a 5 star rating because the model in the picture shows the tight fit accurately.

  I purchased this at a discount in exchange for my honest review.  I do not hesitate to give negative reviews when they are warranted.

This shirt is super cute and really shows off my femininity. I also love that this top can be dressed up or worn just for comfort. It is sooo soft. I love that this product comes in a wide array of colors as well, I might have to get some more in the future!

The fabric is very soft and pretty but very thin and see through so be prepared to wear an under shirt or cami along with it. It is quite a flattering style for me.

It is labeled as a G-1 Jacket. However a G-1 Jacket has USN punched into the wind-flap, this item does not. A G-1 Jacket has a leather tab to fasten the neck closed when the collar is folded up, this item does not. The G-1 has a heavy duty zipper, this item does not, the zipper was so weak looking I thought it might break. A G-1 has a pen pocket in the left outside pocket this item does not. A G-1 does not have hand-warmer pockets this one does. And a G-1 has a horizontal entry pocket on the left side inside the jacket often (incorrectly) referred to as a concealed carry pocket, this item does not. Instead this item has a vertical entry pocket of the left side. It should not be allowed to be called a G-1 because it most certainly is not and to call it such is false advertisement.

Very nice bag, a bit on the small side as can be seen from the product image showing the model holding it (this might sound odd, but look at both color options to see how it looks carried by a male or female--I am a woman and this is the perfect size for me as I am carrying this in addition to a purse and I didn't want a heavy, massive briefcase. It is large enough to hold everything I need for work and there are several pockets including a large double zipped pocket accessible under the outer flap (& on the inside there are two open pockets on one side and a larger zip pocket on the other & no partition). I mostly carry files and folders, maybe a small laptop--nothing too heavy or bulky. Ilike the closure (I have some bags with this type of closure that don't operate smoothly, but this one is flawless). I also appreciate the top handle, and I think the web strap shoulder handle is a great idea as I have a backpack with leather straps that tend to stretch a bit if the bag is heavily loaded. That won't happen with this one (not that I plan to overload it, anyway). I ordered this in black and the leather is smooth and glossy--very attractive and I'm happy to have found this on sale (have to admit the regular price is far out of my price range). I see it has just gone down in price a bit more, darn it--oh, well I still got a good price! I have an older more rustic looking briefcase in brown that has held up wonderfully, so I can see this more polished version lasting me for many years. This arrived wrapped in the original tissue and enclosed in plastic so it definitely seemed new, but I did not receive the little leather hang-tag that has been included with most Frye products I have purchased in the past. Maybe they are only packed with handbags? IDK, but this is just a minor consideration anyway. Also, the flannel storage bag that comes with all Frye bags is also a bit small--maybe the wrong one? as the briefcase barely fits inside, but it isn't going to be stored very often, anyway. Overall I'm very pleased with my purchase
summary: Beautiful leather w/rich, dark glossy finish, feels heavy & supple + strong web-style shoulder strap--not just for men!

reviewText:
This fabric is just beautiful-- it looks like a painting.  I really wish this blouse had worked out for me!  I purchased the green floral pattern in an XXL.
Typically, I wear an XL in tops, 38-40C in bra size, and I do have somewhat chubby upper arms.  I'm about 5'5" and 210ish pounds.  This blouse was very snug in the bust, which would have been okay, had there not been other concerns.  It would be adorable buttoned all the way up-- mimicking a mandarin collar -- but apparently, I have a very large neck!  It was pretty uncomfortable to wear the blouse this way.  It was also *very* short.  Perhaps that's in the description and I just didn't read/didn't measure.  Kind of an awkward length on me; not quite long enough to tuck in, too short (and narrow) at the hips to wear un-tucked.  The petal sleeves were darling and very flattering across my broad shoulders and chubby upper arms.  So... it's going back,  but not because it's bad.  We just weren't a good fit.  (ba-dum ching).
summary: Lovely print, not a great fit

reviewText:
This shirt is cute and fun.  The material is a little thin but not see-through.  I liked the blue color.  Its a great light-weight shirt for summer.  The shirt is positioned enough so I can still wear a standard bra underneath and it doesnt look incredibly obvious.  But you're probably better off wearing a clear-strap bra or a strapless bra.  I love the mid-sleeve and it doesnt interfere with my bending arm.  The material is soft and comfortable, almost like pajama material.  I ordered an XL and it fit nicely: slightly loose but still fashionable.  I did wash it before I wore it and blue strings came out like crazy and wrapped around all my other laundry, creating wrinkled messes on some of my clothes.  I had to re-wash those other clothes because an iron wasn't going to get that it out.  Otherwise happy with the purchase.

I received this product at a discount for my honest, unbiased review.  All opinions are completely my own.  If my review helped you, please click YES.

reviewText: I am returning this. It is not right for me in any way. I am large chested-there is no support even with underwire. The suit is pretty but not high quality material or workmanship.

As a lover of swing and vintage things, this cherry print swimsuit jumped out and was like BUY ME! I absolutely love this swimsuit. It covers my butt fully, no high cut, no half my butt showing for the whole world to see.

The swimsuit is like a tankini (top and bottom) but it is actually just a one piece suit as there is a white liner that lines the front all the way from top to bottom of the suit. When taking the suit out, it does seem to be too long, but if you wear the bottom like a regular bikini bottom, it will fit fine. It seems they made it as a one piece to create natural ruffles in the suit instead of sewing to create the ruffles.

The swimsuit does have HARD CUPS, as mentioned in many of the reviews. But please remember, if you're looking for VINTAGE clothing, if the clothes has a bra/bra support it will be hard. It was the era of harder/stiffer bra cups or even cone bras. Once you keep that in mind, you'll find that this swimsuit really does adhere to the vintage/retro style. I do have B-cups so I didn't have any issue with these cups.
Nice vintage swimsuit. True to fit!

My issues with the product however, it seems to be a little small length wise and the sides of it are open, so if you sit down, someone can easily see your underwear.

With the sizing, it can be quite tight around the crotch area, and if you loosen the straps, your bra will show, so theres not much you can do about it there, but I have a long torso, and it is only tight when I sit down, so my issue with this is small.

Since the sides where the pant legs meet are flow-y and open, when you sit down, without proper adjustment, your underwear will be seen. I plan to fix with my making a few stitches on the side, but I have found fashion tape can work well with this issue. However, if you are aware, this will not present itself as an issue since you can easily adjust your position and the fabric to accommodate this.

Overall, I recommend this product.

I purchased Mabssis Lace Tank Top in Green. I love these type of tank top or cami tops with the lace at the top and bottom. They are great for layering or pretty enough to wear by themselves. I own several other tops similar to this one and Mabssis definitely had some good things about it and some things that could be improved.

First, the color of the top I got in gorgeous. I did not have one in this color and that is why I selected it. It is bright and pretty and unique. The picture definitely represents the actual color of the top. The top is long which is definitely a plus. You can wear it so many different ways and having the extra length looks really good. The lace is pretty and adds a nice touch to the top. It seems well made and I hope to get a lot of use out of it.

There are a few negatives to the top though. For one, the adjustment part on the straps is in the front instead of in the back. On most tops I own, the adjustment is in the back where you can not see it. On this however, it is right there in the front. Now, if you are wearing this underneath something, that is no big deal and probably makes it easier to adjust. However, if you want to wear this by itself, the adjuster piece is right there in the front. For me, that just is not very attractive. I would much prefer it in the back. Also, the fabric is very thin and see through. You have to be very careful what you wear underneath it if you do not want people to see what you have on under it. Also, the lace is very delicate and thin and I will have to be careful how I launder it.

Overall, the top is very pretty and a good addition to my wardrobe.

We got the dressed delivered by DHL on the 22nd.  Yes, a fully custom dress made from scratch and delivered from China in 10 days!  The dress fit perfectly.  The dress looked just like all of the pictures.  The material is high quality and the finish on the custom work was perfect.  My daughter was delighted to have the dress for a senior ball dance.  And the dress made her look like a famous actress at the Academy Awards.  You could easily spend between $500-$1000 on a dress like this at a nice boutique or Nordstroms.  Highly recommend ordering a custom dress from this seller.

reviewText:
The sweater is very stylish! Love the colors and the aesthetics it has. The secondary color usage, the zipper designs, and the pocket locations, all add to this sweater's awesome appeal.

Looks like a sweater you'd expect an anime character to wear, seriously. The slim fit and overall design of the thing just screams, "ANIME!".

One star gets taken off however, for the stitch work. Lots of stray stitching on the seams required tying them off to prevent further fraying and cutting them to prevent snags from unraveling the stitching. The material could also be a little better, since it feels a bit cheap, but with the price of the product, can't really say much about the quality of the materials. You DO get what you spend, after all.

Make sure to accurately measure yourself prior to purchasing any clothes online. I luckily have a slim body profile, which really simplified the sizing for me. If you have a thicker body profile, you might be in a little predicament when it comes to sizing.

Overall, a nice looking sweater for a cheap price! Even though it's cheap, the thing doesn't fall apart on you when you're wearing it. I'm not sure if this thing shrinks when you put it in the dryer, so hang dry it if you do wash it.
summary: Great Looking Product, but With a Little Drawback.

For someone with some minor sewing skills, these are easy repairs, but when you order something, you don't expect to fix it to wear it.
That said, with a little accessorizing, you can hide some of the mistakes and wear it out right away.
If you are mainly a wash it and throw it in the machine type of person, this may not be the type of garment for you.
If you know how to properly care for your clothes, this isn't high maintenance, but it isn't simple wash and wear.

reviewText: About a month after ordering I received an email saying the dress had shipped. Instead of a dress I received a trinket bracelet and the company marked the order as "delivered." After getting Amazon involved, and many emails, they actually shipped the dress. I ordered a size based on my bigger measurement - my waist. It was still tight in the waist but the bust was huge and the arm holes were extremely small. The length was long but I expected to need to hem it. I kept it because the lace and fabric are nice and I like the style. That said, I had to pay a seamstress twice as much as I spent on the dress to have a dress that I can wear. And I won't be very comfortable. They use extremely hard interfacing and boning in the bodice. The bodice was so stiff it looked like it could stand up on it's own. If every one of your measurements match those on their guideline sheet you might try it but if not, avoid buying.

I think it is a perfect bracelet for a young girl as the color, like i said it beautiful, the design is very in style, and the claso is super easy to work. A young girl would definitely be able to manage putting it on or taking off on her own with just one time of being shown how by you.
The bracelet is light weight but feels like it is made pretty well. It also comes in a cute velvet bag for storage when it is not being worn. I like that simple extra because it keeps it from hitting other jewelry and possibly scratching or tarnishing.
I did receive this bracelet at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest qnd unbiased review and based on my experience with this bracelet, that is what i have provided. If my review was at all helpful please let me know by clicking helpful.
Note i will add a couple pictures in a little bit

This bracelet is very cute! It is very easy to put on and take off. The clasp is super easy, it just opens and closes with a little pressure. The color is a nice soft rose gold and it is very pretty. It would match most outfits. Whether you wear it with a fancy outfit or wear it with a nice casual outfit. The only thing about this bracelet that I don't like too much is that it fits a little small and is a little tight. I have skinny wrists. I think this would be a better option for a young girl or a teenager.
*I Recieved this product at a discounted rate
In exchange for an honest review.

These are great - very light and stay up better than the 5 other brands I tried on in stores that wouldn't stay up there. I have been trying to replace a 15-year-old pair of Pearl Izumi warmers to no avail, bought these out of desperation. They are super light, very comfortable, pack small, and (mostly) stay up. Good for spring/fall riding, not for weather below freezing.

Also the inside pockets are not useful, anything I put in them immediately falls out. The buckles also add a lot to the weight.

I am enjoying this handbag it is large enough to carry my iPad (why I purchased it).  The major downside is the separators inside are not very useful from the big pocket to the smaller pocket, I wish they were a little more stable

reviewText: Not sure if I was sent the wrong watch band, but as stated, what I received is not leather, but a counterfeit, vinyl material. It does not smell, nor feel, nor wear like real leather. Sadly, I must remove it from my automatic watch and purchase a REAL band from another seller.

Well made, a good value and comes with a tool to use to install. Though I rated as excellent, I think an instruction sheet would be helpful.  The tool worked to unhook the pins but I had to use a pocketknife blade to snap in the new pins.  Not a problem since I'd always had to do that previously with other replacement bands.  The tool made removal much easer.  No clue what the small diameter pin end of the tool is for. Looks great and stylish plus excellent looking fit and finish.  If this lasts a few years without coming apart or losing its beautiful color, I will definitely buy from Green Olive again.
summary: Will definitely buy from them again!

I purchased this firemans hat with the intention of adding it to my dress-up bin for the kids.  I think this would be nice for a party or part of a fireman costume.  I do not think it will hold up well to repeated use.  It is made of plastic and it does look very nice.  It probably will fit elementary school age children.  Younger kids may be able to wear it but it would be quite oversized.  There is a chin strap that will help to keep the hat in place although I think the elastic is not the best quality.

The label that is applied to the front of the hat is very attractive and it is well placed.  The shape and design of the hat is also very nice.  My concern is the quality of the material from which the hat is made.  It is not as sturdy as expected.  Therefore, I do not think this will have a long life.

It seems quite overpriced to me.  Like I stated before, I expected a sturdier hat.  You could probably find a similar hat for half the asking price or even less.  $7+ seems too much to spend for costume hat in my opinion.

It arrived in a cellophane bag, nothing fancy.  Amazon is notorious for packaging with little protection.  Luckily this was not broken or chipped.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.

reviewText: This bra is perfect! As an EXTREMELY small breasted woman, (as in a 36AA), I have a hell of a time finding a bra that fits. I love the deeper v-neck compared to my usual straight across sports bras. I don't know how they would work out for larger cup sizes as I wasn't blessed with much! These seem to push what little I have together vs. flattening them out. I love this bra and HIGHLY recommend it to others of a similar size.

I was hesitant to buy these, but did so after reading a lot of the reviews. (Can't pass the price, too!) These are super cute and super comfortable, with just the right amount of padding for a smaller cup. I purchased four, and they are now my go-to bra. So I would definitely recommend this pullover bra if you're a 32-36A or B cup. One star removed, as I wish it came in a larger band size. I'm a 38. (I could easily wear a 40 'cause I don't like tight bras.) Unfortunately, this bra leaves me with a band mark when I remove it. I'm hoping the nylon will give way somewhat with wear.
My favorite bra so far. Im a 34b. Love the grey and nude. other colors are very colored and show through clothing, like the light blue and the pinks, had to return those.

reviewText: I bought several bands before finally getting my hands on this little beauty and this was the right one.  I wanted the band for a man's watch, and many expandable bands are narrow so that they can fit an assortment of watch faces.  This one is wider and just barely fits my Pebble round smartwatch, but boy does it look great.  It was too long for my wrist, but I have modified the length of these things before and it wasn't too bad a job - if you have never done that sort of thing before, go to a jewelry store so they can do it right.  The color is a a matte black that is smooth enough that it still gives the impression of reflection of light, but without being glossy or shiny.  The degree of flexion is pretty nice too - stretches without a lot of effort, making it very comfortable.  I won't go with anything else.
summary: Great band, very comfortable, and looks great

reviewText: Here's my review of the 22mm version of this band which may be currently unavailable. I'm 99.9% happy with this expansion watchband. I was a little afraid it was going to be painted white but I'm pleased to report that it's a beautifully smooth, silver mat finish. I put it on a Citizen Eco-Drive Men's Stainless Steel Watch (linked below) and the finish is almost a perfect match, hence the .1%. The watch is slightly glossier but they still look like they were made for each other. The length is perfect for my just shy of 8" circumference wrist. It would be lose on a wrist that was any thinner. The 22 mm width is also a perfect fit. I'll try to get a photo posted soon. Hadley Roma MB8006RWSE 22 White Metal Watch Band
summary: I'm 99.9% happy with this expansion watchband.

reviewText:
This product pages pictures do not begin to do this justice.  I purchased this for my daughter in law to be for her lingerie Bridal Shower.  I thought it was beautiful online but holding in my hands was another thing.

It is a shear, royal blue sparkle material with really pretty silky bows.  Very naughty but sweet.

She usually wears a small but knowing what I have heard I bought the medium and I am glad I did because it fits like a small.  The small fits exactly like the picture, it clings to the top but flows at the bottom.  I did not see the thing on her but she said the thong fit perfect.  :)  The attention to detail with the silky trim on the bottom added to the look.

This is the perfect lingerie for someone to buy for someone like I did.  It makes a nice gift and it also makes a nice gift for the person who it gets worn for.  :)  I would definitely purchase this again anytime for myself or another lingerie party.  I feel the listed price is very reasonable.

Disclosure:  I purchased this at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased feedback.  The words I write are my true feelings and opinion after having it in my possession.
summary: Beautiful for a gift for a Bridal Shower, or for yourself.  Looks Amazing, Naughty and Nice!

I was looking for a modest but sexy swim suit so I choose this one. It also helped that the price was pretty attractive ($8). However, I did not get what I was expecting. The item was not all bad but there was definitely reasons to be disappointed. Below are the pros and cons of this purchase.
Pros
1. The item arrived before time.
2. The fabric is very durable. The top is lined & padded and likewise the bikini bottom is lined. The waist of the bottom as a thick elastic waist band.

Cons
1. The bottom looked nothing like the image. I have included images of the front and back. The back of the bikini bottom does not match the image for sure.
2. The top is irregularly cut causing it to look and fit lopsided. When I put it on there was a noticeable fault and pucker under the left arm. This will have to be altered before I wear it.
3. If you have some butt this will fit like a regular bikini bottom and will not fit like a high waist as shown in the image.
4. There is little stretch in the fabric. This could be a pro and con. If you bought the bikini too small no amount of wash and wear could help you. However, if you bought your size it will be snuggle and could help out a not so bikini ready tummy.

All in all I'm disappointed with the faulty top and the bottom that looks nothing like the pics. The only reason I'm not returning the items is because I live outside of the US and the cost to send it back will out weigh what I actually paid for the suit :(

reviewText: These are great bows! I have 2 pairs of six. I am giving a lower rating because if used on a small baby like a 7 month old infant, and they grab and chew on them - they unravel very easily. There is a fix - you need to run a few stitches in the middle to secure the knot. It's just not secured really properly. I learned it the hard way and a few of the bows got unraveled. There is a fix to that too - only 2 of the 4 ends fall apart, so I cut them and fixed the raw edge with a lighter. They are just twice as small now, but still cute. I just don't think they thought it through when creating these, cute and wonderful as they are (including a black bow which is not common and is great to have). If you fix them before they unravel or if you put them on an older child that doesn't chew on everything then they are perfect.
summary: Wonderful but have a design flaw

The 'boob pads' (not sure how else to refer to these??) are removable, which means you can also add chicken fillets in there for a costume if you need.

I did find I needed to keep hoiking my 'boobs' up throughout the day though, as the costume was a little short for my body (I'm 5'10" and am a size 6/8).

I am at an age where I prefer to wear one piece bathing suits.  I am also at a weight where I feel much more comfortable in a one piece.  I am 5'1" and I wear a US size 14.  I purchased the XXXL in this suit and it fits great.  Of course, no one likes to admit that their suit is an XXXL, but I want you to be able to purchase the right size for yourself based on my US size and the size I bought.

This is a classy suit and very pretty.  I always buy boring suits and colors so I decided to do something different... I bought the red!  It is a gorgeous shade of red and I love it.  It fits comfortably and really hides any flaws and imperfections that my body has.  There is a little sheer panel, but with this color, it is pretty hard to see.

I wear a bathing suit almost daily because we are in our jacuzzi nightly.  This is the kind of suit that I am going to save for when company is over.  This is too pretty to wear everyday in my jacuzzi.  I am definitely saving it for when we have guests in the jacuzzi (which is almost weekly -- so it will be used a lot).

I like the one shoulder strap. This makes this bathing suit very unique. I don't have any that are even close to this style,  It looks like a very expensive suit.

The quality of the suit is superior.  It is a strong, durable material and thick... I have purchased suits in the past that are so thin and alms transparent.  There is padding in the bust but that is where my only con is... the padding would not stay put and did not hit me in the right area.  There are little slits so I was easily able to take out the padding that ended up being useless for me.  The suit is thick enough that the padding is not really needed.

This is a great suit for the money... comparable to a much more expensive suit.  Classy looking and pretty... sexy but modest. Helps to hide your imperfections (though my husband is constantly telling me I have no imperfections... he must need glasses!).

PROS:
well-made
durable
gorgeous red
modest but sexy
thick fabric

CONS:
padding would not stay in correct place in bust

reviewText:
Beautiful swimsuit design!  The concept and design idea of this one piece swimwear is great.  That was actually what drew me toward this particular swimsuit.  The fit was a bit off.  I am a true 6-8 so I ordered a size up 10-12 per the sizing guidelines and even at a size up the fit is very tight and off.  The mesh cut outs and cup holders are off as I tried to pull it up to fit.  I was able to get into it but because the fit was small it totally takes away from the swimwear fit.  As beautiful as it is it was not flattering on me.  I did pass it along to my niece who is about 115 lbs and a size 4-6.  The swimsuit fit her perfectly and looks fabulous on her.

I would indeed order another swimsuit from this line as the quality and design were great.  I would just be sure to go up 2 sizes this time.

reviewText: VERY PRETTY, NOT VERY SHOWY.  WISH IT WAS A BIT BIGGER.

I've been wearing this ring everyday for 7 months now and I only take it off when I'm working out and/or hitting a punching bag. The gold has discolored, which I expected. I'm not sure when. This is actually my promise ring but I do technical work, dig in the dirt planting, and I am an artist/crafter. I have never gotten paint or dirt stuck in the settings, it has never discolored my finger, I've never lost a stone, and it barely has any knicks in it. If you want a ring that stays gold, get a true gold ring, but be advised that gold is a malleable alloy and will bend and knick up easily. I've had gold rings in the past that I beat up to the point of fearing for their little metal life so I chose steel this time. If you don't lift heavy things regularly or use dremel tools you probably can get away with normal gold and little injury but if I grind on a gold ring that'll be the end of it. I wear a half size and it's perfect whether my hands swell or not. I am highly sensitive to metal and all sterling silver, silver, nickel-free, hypoallergenic alloys still make me break out. I get hives from my blue jeans and buttons but not this ring. Whenever we do get around to getting married I will likely insist upon keeping this ring as my wedding band because it's been through jewelry-hell and back. It's a perfect example of love that withstands all things and also it's a part of me now. I'm naked without it. He initially wanted to go to a jewelry store and get something pretty and expensive to which I replied with incredulous staring. We compromised here with "well, it's cheap enough for you to destroy." And it turns out, it's the one thing I can't accidentally break. I'm a happy woman. If you are clumsy, rough, and generally not good at taking care of shiny things, this is the ring for you. If you need a backup or work ring you don't need to worry about, this is also the ring for you. If you want something that looks exactly like the picture for all of time, go somewhere else with more zeros on the price tag. My partner has a tungsten ring specifically so he can't destroy it and I was initially nervous about this one but it turns out, mine is just as durable, but prettier ;)
Very pretty but having difficulty finding something to make the ring fit better cause it's too big and they aren't sold in half sizes

summary: It can not compare to real thing.

I took my daughters to David's Bridal to try on dress styles. They wear a size 16 in clothing but had to try on size 20 and 22 dresses. I ordered a size 20 dress in this style but sent measurements for customization. The dress was pulled and arrived in 2 days but because I knew not to order regular clothing sizes, the 20 fit perfectly. The dress is beautiful. The top is a lighter pink than the bottom. There is material bulging in the mid section but can be smoothed by properly adjusting before strapping in (the ribbon is meant to be tucked inside the dress not tied and hung outside). Some of the sequins are a little loose or have extra threading hanging... these are things that can be fixed easily. This dress is hundreds of dollars cheaper than other sites but just as beautiful! reviewText:
This is a very beautiful dress that is slightly form-fitting at the top and mid section. Based on reviews I went with two sizes up instead of one.  I did this because I wanted it to be free flowing. I have a bit of a belly and I'm very insecure of it. It came out very pretty and fits very well. It looks very flattering on me and it's a very decent length.  It's a very modest dress  perfect for going out in. every girl needs a little black dress and this is one of them.  You can dress it up with a nice necklace or dress it down by  wearing it with jeans or  Leggings. Its a very good quality dress, that is stitched very well.  I am normally a large and went  with a double XL to make it fit better and be more flattering on me.  overall it is a great dress and I recommend it. however does run a little small and if you want to be flattering on you go size or 2 bigger.

This was a mess.
1st you weren't able to select a size. Weird. A bold move when there are so many different sizes of boobs.
Next whoever designed this (I don't think) doesn't understand the physics of a woman. The waist was too big but the breast cups were so small it was embarrassing.
Also. The panties. Just practically a few rubber bands. But the rubber band that comes up the butt crack actually wraps around the waist rubber band and slides from side to side. I don't know why they didn't just sew it into a stationary place, like, I don't know, maybe THE MIDDLE?
I actually got dressed in this right in front of my husband. We actually had a great laugh.
The reason I gave it 2 Stars is because, 1 it was so comical. And 2, the price. If you magically fit in this, I would definitely buy it. It's better than nothing.
I was asked before I was writing a review if this was too big or too small or fit as expected. They need an option that says "was such a mess". I actually sat there and looked at my choices for the longest time. I selected too small. But other areas were too big, yet some we're okay.
I think if they were to make the breast cups stretchy, this would be a lot better. Tons better.

The set did not work for me but I do appreciate he look and style of it although it's rather thin and I don't see it lasting for longer then a photo or one time use piece.

I have the hardest time finding anything to wear in my closet. I have gained so much weight in the past few months I usually feel hopeless and hate having to leave my house! When I go to shopping for clothes I feel like everything out there is made for everyone but me and my body. My mind changed after finding this cute skater dress. I chose the black color even though I really wanted the Teal colored dress. I chose the black figuring that I could dress it up a lot easier.

This dress fits nicely even on my chubby body. :P The material of this dress is so nice, it is light weight and oh so comfy. This lightweight material will be great on the hot summer days when I feel like the sun is beating on my black fabric, this dress is airy enough to feel nice.  I like the waist line in this dress, I like the perfect high waist line that still lets it flow nicely from the waist down to cover my chubs. Lol The top part of this dress is nicely fit, it does not show too much but is just perfect for a nice necklace to add a little something to the dress.
My favorite thing about this dress though is being able to wear it casually or you can dress it up for a night out. It is easy to add a cover up or cute jacket with if you would like. Or wear it without and great for a nice warm day. I will be wearing this dress a lot, it is comfy, made from great material and looks great!

This dress is beautiful! It looks exactly as pictured, and fit true to size. I ended up returning it because the proportions were a little off for my body since I'm 5'11", and the dress was not long enough for me. However, this dress would look gorgeous on someone with a more petite build than me! It just hit a little weird on my hips. The beading on the back is absolutely stunning, and I debated keeping it and trying to make it work just for the back! The jersey is thick and great quality, and is not at all see-through. There is a slight train in the back which looks really elegant without being too long. The beading seemed to be attached well when I tried the dress on, and I didn't have any issues with the zipper. The jersey material has enough stretch to hug your curves and looks super flattering! I really loved this dress, and would have kept it had the proportions been more for a tall person. This dress is great quality, and I would totally recommend it!

reviewText:
I like this swimsuit. The length is appropriate for my height, 5'6. The material and elastic have the appropriate give. The swimsuit is very comfortable. The cups in the top aren't removable, they are sewn into the swimsuit. The cups are too large for me. If the cups were removable this would fit me better. If you're a plus size woman with a smaller chest I would pass on this swimsuit. It's made for women with larger cup sizes. If you're a cup A-C these cups will be a little too big for you.

Ratings (Out of five stars):
Material Quality: *5*
Stitch Quality: *5*
Cup Size & Removability: *1*
Style: *4*
Value: *5*

Overall rating: 20 out of 25 stars / 4 Star Average

SUMMARY: This is a well made comfortable swimsuit. The cups aren't removable and they are designed for cup sizes D+. If you have a smaller cup size I would pass. This suit has straight stitching, no loose threads or seams. Quality wise, this is a very well made swimsuit.

reviewText: This fit the bill quite nicely. Seems sturdy enough. Nice looking Holds as much jewelry as shown in the photo.

This is perfect for taking pictures of my handmade jewelry.  It is pretty big which gives me plenty of options but still fits inside my light box.  I love that I can either hang my earrings and earring cards off the top or I can use the pins to hang them on. This piece opened up a whole world of possibilities for photographing my jewelry.  It's black velvet so there is no glare.  That back stand is made of cardboard and will need to be handled delicately so you don't damage it. It comes in a reusable and resealable bag for storage which is a plus to keep it clean. The pins that were enclosed are terrible though.  That is the only problem I have with it.  It felt like they were beginning to rust and several of them were bent.  However, pins are cheap enough and I will be purchasing some with black heads so that they blend into the display better and keep the focus on my jewelry.  I received this at a discount for my honest review and I couldn't be happier that I bought it.  This is now my go to display to take my photographs.

I received my Valdler Velvet Jewelry Display stand just 2 days after ordering it. It holds necklaces, earrings, rings & bracelets. It comes with one pk of beaded needles to help hold the jewelry to the board. The velvet board has a sponge layer in the middles so it's soft. This helps keep your jewelry organized and nicely displayed. Necklaces stay tangled free.

I received this item free for my honest and unbiased review. I would recommend this item to anyone looking to display their jewelry.

reviewText:
This swimsuit is absolutely adorable and looks exactly as it does in the pictures. Being that the weather hasn't warmed up yet, I haven't been able to try swimming in it but I have no doubts that it will hold up perfectly.

Keep in mind, you will need to size up. I'm about the same size as the model shown (aside from the bust) and so I ordered the medium. Fits very well on the bottom and sits right on the waistline. Top is a tiny bit smaller than I'm comfortable with but it works, especially since the straps are wider than on most swimsuits. One thing I did not see mentioned in the description, the top does have a little bit of padding/push-up. It's also lined, has a metal clasp on the back (not adjustable) and ties at the neck.

All in all, I'm very happy with the swimsuit. The polka dots are adorable and contrast well with the red detail, fit is pretty nice, and is the exact style I was looking for. I can't wait for summer now. :-)

reviewText: Cute in the picture but it real life looks very cheap...

I've been looking for a suit in this style for some time because I think it's just adorable, and is more appealing to me than something more modern. I really love the pattern on this suit, and the cute little red bows really go with the color scheme. I bought a size XL because I'm a size eight, 5' 7", and 160 pounds, give or take. The bottoms fit perfectly. They are so cute, and everything I wanted them to be.

The top... looks better in the picture. It's a very stiff bra top with almost pointy cups that are kind of awkward and feel like they push down instead of up. If the cups were a bit more rounded, I would be able to fill them out well enough. I'm a 34C, but I can't really decide if the top is too big or too small; it just doesn't fit quite right. That probably won't stop me from wearing it, because the suit does keep me covered, and seems to keep everything secured, but if I spy a better-fitting top that matches, I definitely won't hesitate to snag it. Which is a shame, because in spite of the ill fit, the top (and the suit itself) seems to be quite well made.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

Beautiful retro bathing suit. Very good quality swimwear. Fully padded top with good construction. Cups are not made from that flimsy material you see in some department stores. Colors are very true and not thin and faded. The bottoms seem to run fairly true to size but I did find the top to run somewhat small so order a size larger if you are not sure. I would highly recommend this product and seller. I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and fair review.

I recently lost 90lbs and have a lot of loose extra skin. The bottoms of this suit are pretty awesome. They offer very modest back coverage, they come up nice and high, and they don't cut around the legs.

The top, however, is not at all my favorite. The cups sit low and SUPER wide. I'm including a pic of a top view. The cups push back in at the top of the cup and then the halter material extends up behind that. Even if you try to get some lift or push-up, anything you accomplish is thwarted by how the cup pushes back in and pancakes you. It does have a nice metal clasp in the back but that's about all it has going for it, for me at least.

The suit came in a nice zippered bikini bag with handle which was an unexpected surprise.

The material is very nice and high quality. The white polka dots are NOT see through which is awesome.... you run in to that problem with cheaper quality suits.

I'll keep this suit because I love how supportive and full coverage the bottoms are. I'll prob shop around for a solid black tankini top to go with it. The bottoms are sturdy enough that I think they'll be perfect for water aerobics.

As other reviews mention, this suit runs SMALL. I'm 5'3", 145lbs, and usually wear a women's small top and medium bottoms. I'm a women's dress size 6. I'm a junior's pant size 9. I ordered an XL and am glad I did!
I received this at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Bottom is GREAT...Top not so much

The shorts come to the belly button and the wide waist strip is very flattering and comfy. These could be used as exercise shorts for her tumble class also with a tank top. I have dearlovers down on my list for swim wear because im honestly impressed with how it is made and im really hard to please when it comes to bottoms of a swimsuit. We've recently purchased the Monkey and Chicken book bags by Lovely Sprouts.  They are very cute and my kids love them.  Bags are well made, well stitched together.  Features are stitched and not painted (i.e eyes, nose, etc).  Zippers are polished chrome, with plastic loop to be able to easily operate, and they are very smooth. Main compartment has movable bottom to keep the bottom flat, and can flipped up so that bag can be collapsed.  There's a divider inside the bag for note pads and small items.  Front zippered pocket would be perfect for wallets and permission slips.  Straps work well, with mesh to allow a bit of breathing, including the back of the bag.  These bags have pockets on the sides, perfect for water bottles and juice boxes.  Overall, these bags are well put together and seem to be very high quality.  Due to relatively thick material instead of thin canvas, bags should last.  Sewn-in name tag on the back of the bag is a very nice touch.

These bags are very nicely made, doesn't have strong odors, and functional with many compartments.  My kids walk around the house with books in them for story time and can't wait till they are old enough to go to school.  Just one more year!
Good quality fabric and construction, however these run EXTREMELY large. It was swimming on my 19 month old and she is over the 100th percentile for height.

reviewText: Adorable & easy to get on & off & provides great coverage for sensitive toddler skin.  Great price!

It fit my 22 pound, 1.5 year old child just fine with some room to grow even (the more stylish might have called it a bit baggy). It's not a super-thick material. You can see the diaper a bit through the light blue material. It's held up all summer without a problem though. The best part about it is how easy it is to get on and off. The usual rash guard shirts have a tight collar that is tough to pull on and off a child's head (although probably better for sunburn prevention since it has better coverage of the neck). This is great because it is easy to zip and unzip in the front. AND it has snaps in the crotch so you can change a diaper without having to take the entire outfit off. That was the big selling point for me. And the price. I consider it a great deal.
summary: Easy to put on and take off
