I just love my cute sky blue Buddha bracelet. I love the gorgeous blue beads beside the silver ones.  The Buddha head bead is exquisite, with lots of delicate details.  The band is made of elastic which is wonderful because it accommodates several different sizes of wrists, without being too tight or too loose.  I can wear it or I can let my granddaughter wear it without having to worry about her losing it. The bracelet comes in a neat little pouch, making it perfect for giving.  I believe that blue tones are supposed to bring calm and peace into your world.  Whether or not that is true, I don't know; I do know that looking at it makes me happy.

 ** I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. **

I really like this cute little bracelet.
This stretchy bracelet comes in varying colors of blue ranging from aqua to pale baby blue. Some of the beads are two toned. Though the description states the color as sky blue, my bracelet is more in the aqua tones. Very pretty.
There is a buddha head and two other symbols all in a silver tone and it is a little loose on my wrist ( I am not tiny) so this should comfortably fit larger wrists too.
 I am into all things yoga or buddha so this a really nice addition to my other jewelry.

I received this at a discounted price for my honest review.

I absolutely love this bracelet, and the meaning behind the sky blue Buddha bracelet.  I love mala beads. They are pretty to wear, as well as a useful aid for meditation and calming your mind. The bracelet has some beautiful tones of blue and white in it,  with the Buddha head as the center point. I wear mine everywhere.  When I get stressed, I take the bracelet off and run each bead through my fingers one at a time while I  breathe in and out. The beads help keep my thoughts from drifting and the smoothness of the beads are rather calming.  The bracelet has a stretchy cord, so it will fit most everyone.  I do have a small writs and like my bracelets to fit tight. This is loose fitting.  I normally wear it above my watch. It's a really beautiful bracelet.  I received this product at a discount for an honest unbiased review. These words and thoughts are all my own.

This wand is of excellent quality, I compared it to a similar wake of a different style bought from universal studios and it is the same thing, the only difference was the box on the outside had images of the seventh movie rather than the original passion box. I would buy this again for anyone who loves the HP books and movies as much as me and my girlfriend do!

I purchased this item for a discounted price of $17.00 in exchange for an unbiased and honest review. Thanks.

To be clear, this is not the officially licensed version by Warner Bros - Noble Collection. I am very familiar with the quality and packaging of the Noble Collection wands and can compare the two. In terms of the actual wand itself, the quality is comparable and it is hard to tell the difference between this one and the official version. The packaging looks good, but it is not in an Ollivander's box. This is not a cheap knock-off. It looks very much like the wands sold at Universal Studios or on the Warner Bros website. I would not be at all surprised if it turned out that the same company made both and just put it in different boxes - after all, both are made in China. I don't know if this statement is true, it is speculation on my part. So if you are buying this as a gift for someone who really cares about the Ollivander's box, then go with the official version. But if you are buying this to display on a wand stand, this is a good choice. I purchased this at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review.  I was able to talk to the vendor and found the vendor very responsive. I bought two other wands from this vendor - Fred Weasley and Narcissa Malfoy wands - I am happy with all. The 5 stars is for the quality of the wand compared to the official version and for the vendor responsiveness. I didn't detract anything for the packaging because it is a nice box with padded lining to protect the wand. It just is not the Ollivanders box.

This was the 11th wand I have bought from this manufacturer, Vankos. Aside from the fact that there is obviously a very serious Harry Potter obsession in my household and we need another hobby other than spellcasting and wizard duels, the reason I have repeatedly bought from this vendor is due to the customer service.

All of the wands that I received were of high quality. There was one that I got which was obviously of substandard quality. I reached out to the seller and shared my concern. T. Vanko responded within 24 hours and the wand was replaced free of charge . The replacement wand was of the same high quality as the others, so I suspect that they had a quality issue which was soon addressed.

This Death Eaters wand in particular resonates more with me than with other members of my household because I was sorted into the Slytherin house. Borgin and Burkes is my favorite store in Knockturn Alley.

Many of the comments I made in reviews of other Vankos wands apply to this one as well, so for ease of reference I will paste it below:
I find myself in Orlando, FL on a fairly frequent basis and I was able to do a side-by-side comparison of this Death Eaters wand compared to the official version sold in the Universal Studios theme park.

PROS:
* Out of the box, it is almost impossible to tell which one is the official version. They appear to be virtually identical.
* This wand comes in a nice padded box that protects it from being easily damaged. The box is of gift quality.
* This brand is cheaper than the official version available at Universal Studios.

CONS:
* The box is nice, but it is obviously not the real thing. There are Chinese characters on it that is a clear indicator this is not the official version. The marketing on the box is a little off. The box does not have the ribbon in it that the official wands have and it does not match what is shown in the movie.
* This is not an interactive wand that can be used to cast spells at the Universal Studios park. But, it was not marketed as such and therefore I cannot fault the manufacturer for this.

Overall, this is a great alternative to the official version of the Death Eaters wand.  I had an opportunity to purchase this at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review.

I ordered this as a present for my Brother-In-Law. He is a serious Harry Potter fan. We thought he would like this one because he has a death eaters symbol tattoo. I haven't given it to him yet (I will update with how much he likes it after I do). I think the wand in the picture looked like it was better detailed than the wand I received. Everyone here in my household is impressed with this wand (maybe I'm just picky). I think he will still absolutely love it though. It is not too light or too heavy. This is a high quality, weighty resin replica of the actual movie prop. It is comfortable to hold. It is made of resin and seems to be fairly durable. The box it came in is nicely designed and sturdy, not cheaply packaged. It has a pretty gold silky lining inside. It will make a great costume accessory if he chooses to use it that way. I cannot wait to see his reaction to this wand. I truly hope he loves it.
**Update- He LOVED it! He was so happy and excited to get it. He is already planning on taking it with him to the numerous Harry Potter events that he attends.**
I received this Replica Wand at a discount so I could give them my genuine, unbiased review. The views and opinions in this review are solely mine and are in no way influenced by the price I paid for this Replica Wand.
summary: Good replica. Hope the recipient likes it.**UPDATE- He LOVED it! **

reviewText: Received as promised

I ordered these adorable shoes for my 2 month old daughter. I have ordered a different pair of the 0-6 month Romirus moccasins in the past and thought they were adorable, well made, and looked cute on my baby! I thought the design of this pair would be great for summer!

I ordered size 1/0-6m but received a size 2/6-12m instead. I'm sure just an error in packaging. Unfortunately, my daughter will not be able to wear these anytime soon. I do plan on keeping and hoping she will be able to wear them next spring.

The shoes have a rubber sole, the inside is cushioned which is great for those little baby feet. The shoes are lightweight, and soft. I do believe these shoes are great for little ones who are crawling and learning to walk. They aren't heavy at all and they bend easily with the foot. Overall I am very happy with this purchase even though we won't be able to wear this specific pair anytime soon. I do think I will order the black pair and hope they arrive in the size I ordered and she can wear this summer. I received a discount for this item in exchange for my honest review. I only order items I intend on using, especially baby items. My opinions are my own.
summary: Cute, flexible, and great for new walkers

reviewText:
I ordered these moccasins Friday night, and by Sunday morning I had them on my porch and I was so excited. My baby girl isn't here yet, but I have purchased tons of shoes and moccasins before because I have 3 other children and I can tell these ones are just as good quality at the WAY more expensive ones. When babies are growing so fast what is the point in buying shoes for them every 2 weeks and spending $30-50 dollars on 1 pair of shoes?! These shoes were packaged well and look so cute, I can't wait for my baby to get here so she can wear them. (I will update my review then)

The shows look exactly like they do in the photos too. The colors are the exact same as well. I got the light pink closed toe mocs and the tan open toe Mocs and they look just like the photos. These tan ones have a nice rubber sole which is great! It's not the thick rubber sole that causes shoes to be heavy and uncomfortable, it's a lot thinner but still resistant and flexible. I tried bending the shoes back and forth to test and they're perfect and bend just fine without feeling heavy. Most babies HATE wearing heavy, hard shoes and these ones are perfect for littles. You can tell these will hold up.

I'll definitely be ordering many more!

I love these sandals for my grandson, they are real leather and he loves them. They breath and he can wear them without socks.
I recommend these shoes as a gift or for your baby and I received these shoes at a discounted price in exchange for my honest, fair and unbiased review. I was able to test and evaluate this product before I made this review. This is a required disclaimer but it does not make my amazon reviews any less true.
summary: I love these sandals for my grandson

reviewText: Okay so when I ordered these shoes I measured my daughters feet and I got her a size 3 US size. Now, my daughter is 17 months old and she is small. I put that they fit as expected because they clearly state that the shoes run large and to measure the feet in inches and go off that size so that is what I did. They took a LONG time to arrive but that is expected coming from a far distance. The leather is soft on her feet and the inside is very soft and comfortable fabric. The fringe on the sides is sticking up (probably from shipping) and I'm hoping it goes down but it isn't enough to bug me. One of the things I REALLY love about these shoes is that when you go to put them on the elastic stretches out enough that you aren't struggling to put them on the babies feet but when you get them on it stays put so it's not going to just fall off, my daughter can run in these with no problems. The soles on these are perfect for toddler/new walker! They are thick enough that they aren't ripping holes through from walking but soft enough they aren't trying to walk flat foot. I LOVE the peep toe! Not only do I love these cute little shoes but my daughter loves them too.
summary: The leather is soft on her feet and the inside is very soft and comfortable fabric. The fringe on the sides is sticking ...

When items are purchased from a foreign seller, we should know it.  In looking at their sizing information, I should have known better.  The shirt is lovely, but extremely small.  I wear a size 12 in EVERYTHING, so I went over-board when ordering this shirt and ordered a 2XL - should have been ok, but is so small I can't get my arms in it.  If you are a size 12 order at least a 4XL, which is ridiculous!  Amazon  needs to have some way of letting us know quickly and easily when ordering if it is not an American company.  I have attempted to purchase clothing here and it is ALWAYS from another country, which makes sizing difficult to determine.  Maybe they need to make a "Made in America" button????

reviewText:
I know we live in a "throwaway" culture, but I really expected to be able to have these shoes for my child until she outgrew them. My 4 year old wears them to preschool for 4 hours daily then takes them off when she comes home. She doesn't wear them outside of that time frame.

The shoes were very cute out of the box, bright colored and sparkly. My daughter was very excited. The zippers are heavy so they do the job. The fobs on the zippers are flimsy and not heavy. I really hoped these shoes would make it, because they are adorable. Only reason they get 2 stars instead of 1.

The shoelaces are absolutely, ridiculously too long. I have included pictures. What is the point of this? A little kid does not need 2 foot long overhang on shoelaces. This is a huge safety hazard. I have to quintuple knot her shoelaces so that the laces so not drag, as she will not let me tuck them in, and they would not stay tucked in, at any rate, because just too long.

The cute pink bows are not sewn on or even into a bow shape. They are glued on, and have fallen off already (see pic). This is very disappointing and we had a tantrum over this as well. The rubber toes are already peeling back also.

I am looking for a better pair of lace up shoes. Don't waste your money.
summary: Cheaply made. Falling apart after 6 weeks

I think this bathing suit is very cute. I read about the sizing and according to people's opinions, I ordered a much larger size than I would have if based on US sizing, (in bathing suits, roughly a 10-12. I've always had to go larger on bathing suits.) However, it actually was a bit big on me underneath, where there's a mesh one piece layer. I wasn't tall enough to stop it from bunching up. I ordered a 4XL which sounds very big, but Asian sizing runs small. However, I think I over compensated in ordering a 4XL based on some reviews I read. I would have been better off with perhaps an XL. I'm not sure. Bathing suits are tough to order online and I wish I sized this right because I love it!  I found the chest area lacking in support but that's because I ordered too big. There are cup liners- a feature I love in case you're cold. There's no risk of show through. The halter neckline allows you to adjust the bathing suit and is very comfortable. I think the fabric is quality. It feels great to the touch, (very smooth- not rough or cheap feeling in the least). I love the retro look of the Angerella Womens Navy Stripe One Piece Swimsuit Bathing Suit. If I order another, I'll be sure to go a size or two smaller. In clothing I wear a Medium, sometimes Large on top depending on the cut, (I tend to wear thing a bit too big). In pants I'm typically an 8, but sometimes have to go into a 10 if they're jeans- again, depending on the cut. If you look at the sizing chart for this bathing suit, it's based on US sizing. I did my research and made an educated guess. Please keep that in mind when ordering. If you get the size right, I think you'll be very pleased with this adorable suit!  All in all, I think this is a great bathing suit at a very reasonable price. Too bad I sized it wrong! I purchased this bathing suit at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
summary: I think this is a great bathing suit at a very reasonable price. Too bad I sized it wrong!

I would love it, if it weren't for the fact that the sizing is extremely small. I bought this for my wife, who is very petite and normally wears a size 2 - 4. I ordered, per the size chart, a size "Large" (this is the first time I've ever bought a size Large for her... to say I was afraid of what would happen is an understatement, but the swimsuit looks very sexy and I thought I'd roll the dice)....

Let me start with the good - this swimsuit is well made, arrived fast, and looks exactly like it does in the pictures.

The bad.... the sizing chart (third picture) might be optimistic. The sizes are either measured in "Little Person" or "Pre-teen" sizing. No adult female is likely to fit in a "Large". If the sizing is accurate, perhaps 0.01% of the American adult female population, specifically those who are small in chest, thin in build, and vertically challenged, might fit a size "XL". The average petite woman, which already is a tiny percentage of society, might get away with an XXL.

I pity the man that buys his petite girlfriend, wife, mistress, or casual friend a size "XXL". Perhaps there are places in America where that would be laughed off or survivable. Here in the south, buying the mother of your children, who has maintained an incredible figure in spite of being a wonderful cook and a busy professional, an "XXL" swimsuit is an easy way to find yourself in small pieces on a hog farm.

This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review. Even so, I do my best to be fair and honest in my reviews. As you can see from my profile, not every item gets five stars, and I bring up shortcomings in items as I find them. I do try to exercise some care in selecting items to buy, even when they are provided at a discount, based on other reviews and existing product knowledge - if I suspect that an item won't be good, I don't buy it in the first place.

I'm glad I gave VfEmage dresses another shot. My first purchase was a dress that was completely huge and oddly fitting -- despite all the warnings that this brand runs two sizes small. This one fits amazingly. It is definitely made for smaller women with high waists and hourglass figures. If you've been struggling to find clothing sized small enough for you, this one is worth a try. I'm 5'1" and 105-110 pounds and I ordered a size small.
The material is a thick synthetic stretch with a smooth, polished finish and matte texture. It covers bulges in the body well. I ordered the green, and it is a beautiful, rich blue-green. The neckline is neatly pleated in the design shown, which has a pleasing sophistication. The skirt is a few inches below the knee on my 5'1" body. I found the sleeves to be a bit too loose, and probably the shoulder area also, but this has been the case for me on dresses from most brands.
The back zipper seems to work fine. The back of the dress is very plain, but it does have pleats which allow it to follow the curvature of your rear and hips better.

Very satisfied with this purchase!
summary: Great fitting dress for small women with high waists

This long-sleeve cover up was exactly what I was looking for because it protects from the sun without leaving a horrible tan line.

Two things I was afraid of before buying this product:
1. That the neck would be too tight (I hate that feeling. It makes me feel claustrophobic).
2. That I would get horrible tan lines on my wrists and neck.

Neither of these were an issue, as the neck had plenty of room and I didn't get ANY tan lines!

However, the fit was smaller than I had expected in other areas. The arms are slimmer than I thought it would be, as well as the stomach area. I guess I should've known better based on the product image. The product description and other reviews made it seem as if it were a "baggy" fit, so I thought that I could order a size small, and it would be fine. It fits smaller than I'd like, and is definitely NOT "baggy." Also, the shirt rides up my belly, constantly exposing my pot belly, which is NOT what I want. But overall, I still like the product and got great use out of it over the summer. I just wish it was a looser fit than the product makes it seem.

MY ADVICE: go one size up if you want a looser fit.
summary: Good Coverage, Fits Smaller than Advertised

reviewText: A+

So this is such a cute little wristlet! I know the description says that its leather and I don't know enough about leather to really state whether it is one way or another, but I can tell you its adorable and its perfect for when you don't want to carry around a big purse. I love the hot pink color I received and the little studded design on the exterior. I have another wristlet thats pretty plain in design and I definitely prefer this one; I just think its cuter than my other one and its perfect for a night out with the girls. The zippers all work flawlessly which is excellent. Ive received more than my share of wallets, purses, etcwhere the zippers don't work right. The inside is a nice brown material that complements the exterior as well. Theres plenty of room for essentials. I can easily fit my phone, license, credit cards, cash, my lighter, cigarettes, a lip gloss or two, and still have some room. Obviously the more you put in it, the bigger its going to be size wise but it is rather roomy for a wristlet. The strap is removable as well so I could easily use this as a little makeup pouch in my purse too. I think its a cute wristlet thats well-made and definitely serves its purpose. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.
summary: So cute, love the studded design!

reviewText: Cute dress but too big!!

I must say, finding just the right size in Asian clothing, is something like a crap shoot. I can never be quite sure how or if, it's going to turn out okay. This was just another gamble I took and luckily it worked out well for us. My husband is extremely frugal and he wears clothes (including socks...oh and shoes), until they're all full of holes and barely hanging together by a thread. It's not like he can't afford to buy himself things, but he just seems to be scared to spend money. I guess it's a good thing I don't have those issues and we balance each other out. I was given a 50% off discount for these shorts, in return for my leaving a fair and unbiased, honest review. So after checking and rechecking the size chart, I decided to choose the 5XL for him. To be honest, I had never thought about how tiny Asian sizes are compared to U.S. and I'd never thought I'd ever have to order a 5XL for my husband. When the shorts arrived, we had a big laugh over it, and even funnier, was that they still looked like they were too small. In fact, they looked like something I could fit and I normally wear a Women's size Small. We pulled the drawstring waistband as wide open as they'd go and he tried them on and they actually fit! I mean, they fit perfectly! Of course, because these are rather long and fit baggy, you can wear it wherever you want the waistband to rest....whether right on the waist or further down. The inseam on the 5XL (size US Large equivalent) is 10" and the leg from waistband to hem is 22" and has a slit at the bottom. The waistband is pretty wide at 2.25" and has 3 strong and sturdy elastic bands, with a white cotton drawstring cord in the middle one. These shorts are well constructed and the outer fabric is a soft meshed Nylon like material. There's also a really nice breathable, inner fabric lining. On top of everything else, there are 2 large side pockets! I like these so much, I'm going to buy myself a pair in another size and color. I chose the Bright Yellow with Black for him, because those are the colors of his favorite school (iowa Hawkeyes). There are actually 10 colors to pick from, in 7 sizes. Nice!
summary: Size 5XL really is a size Large.

reviewText:
Very good tie. Very bright and colorful. The material is very soft and yet strong and sturdy as well. Available in many different color and patterns. reviewText:
This tie is great for the hubby. He wears a tie everyday for work, so different colors and patterns are necessary. This tie is a bit wider in width than he normally wears, but he has also been wanting one the has a little more width, just to test it out, see how he likes it, and how it looks on him. The deep purple color is pretty nice. it is a shiny purple color, without much of a design or pattern to it- but that also means that it will match that many more outfits. The plain purple color will also coordinate better with many other outfits than normal. The length is perfectly fine, and he is a taller guy. This tie also includes the band on the underside for threading the loose end to once it is tied. That is feature that you do not normally get unless you get the expensive ties. It really does look pretty good on him. If you are looking for a skinny tie, this is probably not the way to go, initially. It is a good product for the value. The material of the tie is silky, as the description implies. It arrives in perfect condition, without any problems at all. I have not washed it yet, but it will either need to be washed gently by hand, or taken to the dry cleaners. That is usually done a couple times a year, and all at once. Overall, I would recommend this product.

I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased review. This review is composed of my own thoughts and views of the product. I am in no way affiliated with the company, and am not being compensated for my honest product review.

I don't think my husband has ever owned a tie. When I saw this tie, I was reminded of our wedding last year, because the shade of purple in this tie is exactly the same as one of our wedding colors. As it's one of my favorite colors, I have a lot to match it. I was a little disheartened to see that the shipping time frame was such a large range - the range itself spanned three weeks, up to six weeks after the date of purchase. I wasn't expecting to receive it anytime soon, but to my surprise, it arrived a short 7 days after the date of purchase. I love everything about this tie: the width, length, color, silky sheen and smoothness. It looks great on him and I can't wait for him to wear it out.

Please note that I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion. My review is based solely on my experience with this product, and I was in no way compensated for providing this review.

reviewText: Perfect, and RFID a plus.

These have been my favorite wallets for more than two decades. In that time period I think I have bought 3 or 4. They are tough and last for years. The only thing that ever wears out is the ID card plastic window. Other than that, never had any issues. Strong recommendation.

Love the wallet it has room for everything and not too bulky for a tri-fold. The Nylon material and build quality is great and will last. I had one of these in the late 80's and early 90's as a kid for years but it was lost.  I am happy to see these becoming popular again.  These are super simple to care for just empty it out and wash it with laundry. I do wish for one feature, i wish it had a loop to attach a chain or carbiner to secure the wallet. I find if its not loaded up with cards and stuff it can slide out of the back pocket fairly easy and being so lightweight i don't notice it missing.  I have lost the wallet in couch cushions etc.  I loaded it up with pictures and more stuff and it does not fall out anymore but i still wish it had an attach point for chain or caribiner. For the price you cannot go wrong with Rainbow wallets.
summary: Great study, cheap and comfortable wallet that will last years.

reviewText: Too chunky. Catches on everything.

We purchased this Butterfly Adjustable Toe Ring to go with a butterfly theme of her outfit accessories based upon her butterfly tattoo.  The toe-ring was meant to be worn during an informal social event (AKA Beer n BBQ Tail Gate Party) in warm Texas weather

This toe ring arrived within a respectable amount of time given its overseas shipping point of origin.  It was packed in a box with a few other times and was packed separately in a small baggy.  The toe ring arrived intact and unblemished.

Our first impression of the item was that it was delicate and easy to break.  We found it to be surprisingly sturdy and flexible when opened and closed.  The stones, which accent the butterfly shapes, shined nicely under normal light conditions.  The butterflies were clearly distinguishable when worn and viewed from a meter away.  Any further and they were just bright spots, which was just fine. The look of the toe ring was just what we were looking for.  It looks great in shoes or barefoot.  Oh and one last thing: put the toe-ring on after you have donned your shoe because the butterflies, which are fairly thick, can get snagged on straps and pinch your toe.

We did not contact customer service because the toe ring was exactly what we had ordered.  So far, we have no complaints with it and we will buy this item again if/when it breaks.  If you are looking for a cute, shiny and affordable toe-ring; get this one and be happy!

As always using Amazon to shop is great because you have a wealth of information and images to make informed decisions from the safety of your own home.  Similarly, they make addressing issues which require replacements or refunds, a breeze to deal with.  Especially when you live two miles from a shipping point, like we do.

I ordered the multi-color nose studs and Im happy with the purchase!  They are so cute and fun.  Ive had my nose pierced for 15 years and I always buy the small nose studs, just like these.  Anything else seems too gaudy to me (personal preference).  These are the perfect size and exactly what I want.  I love the fun colors so I can change them with my outfit.  My only issue is that the nose stud I currently have is shorter and thicker than these.  I don't want my piercing to close or get tighter so I will alternate still and change them out to keep the hole at the bigger size.  The picture posted shows the differences (right stud is my current, left is the new stud).  I also like the shorter ones because in the past, if I hit my nose, the shaft is less likely to puncture my nose and bleed.  But the longer shaft is okay and not a deal breaker.

Dont be scared off by the picture of the girl on this, they are not nearly so big. And a pet peeve of mine.check the spelling on your products: SURGLCAL is not a word (picture).

Overall, Im happy with this and look forward to changing them out.  This is probably more than I would ever need but happy that I get the choice.  Its also nice and compact so I can carry them with me when I travel.  I also don't have to worry about losing them because I can just stick them in the foam material.  Thanks!

I am always looking for simplistic, elegant earrings. So when I ran across these earrings I just had to have them! The construction of the earring is nicely crafted. You basically get a small stud attached to a rose gold plated chain. On the other end is a iridescent pearl that is flawlessly attached to the chain. The pearl is actually a little bit bigger than I expected which was great. They are not overly heavy in the year but you need to push the back on the earring closely to the ear to keep them from pulling downward. I almost wish the stud was just a little bit bigger because when the back is tighter on my ear it kind of wants to pull through my ear a little. I almost think if you have one of the disc type backs it might would sit up on the ear better. The only other thing that I ran into with these earrings is that the chain seems to kink. The kinks keep the chain from hanging straight. I don't know if can be helped because of the type of chain. Overall I am very pleased with the earrings. They will go with almost anything from casual to formal. I did receive this product at discount for a honest review. This is 100% my personal opinion based on my experience with the product.

These earrings are super cute! What I love the most about them is you could wear them with just about anything. From casual to formal, they are perfect.

First things first, sorry for the lack of better photos. They were taken not for reviewing purposes in mind. Some are screenshots of a video my friend sent to a bridesmaid who lives long distance. I sadly don't have an option to upload the video via mobile app. Okay, now onto the review!

Shipment: It got to me in the two day mark (Amazon Prime). Warning! The package will be a lot smaller and lighter than you would think. It came with a jeweled belt/sash and some sort of bag. (I won't be using the bag included as a garment bag. It's way too small.)

Sizing: I am normally a size 6-8 in dresses depending on the store and cut of the dress. After reading someone's suggestion to order a size up, I did, and I am so glad that I did. I got a size 10 and it barely fit me. If it was any smaller, my butt wouldn't have slipped in the dress comfortably. Also, I am 5'7 in height without shoes. You will need to wear heels to make up for the extra length at the bottom. I suggesting maybe 2-3 inches if you're my height.

Putting this on: If you have a more curvaceous bottom, step into the dress versus putting this over you. The bottom is made more slim (the mermaid style), and putting it over your head  would cause the dress to suffocate you. (Lesson learned first hand, lol!)

How it looks: Let me say this first, there are two visible seams running down the front. If I was a more financially blessed individual, I would have immediately returned this. Due to the price, I can't say that I'm surprised. Items made in China tend to look different than what's modeled in the stock photo. It's a huge problem and that's very sad. On a positive note, this fits my body perfectly. Anything smaller, anything bigger, and I would have been doomed.

Material: This is a very cheap material. It's super light and thin. You would need to be careful of what kind of spanx and dress slip you would wear underneath. The seams may show through.

Suggestions to buyers: Buy this if you're on a budget. It doesn't look bad and it'll do for the one hour wedding ceremony. Buy those sticky bras to help you lift your "girls" if you're a B cup like myself. Moreover, your thighs will be together while you walk. Wear spanx that has shorts at the bottom to prevent chaffing.

Message to the Seller: Please provide your own photos when selling something. Therefore it leaves little room for misleading the customer. The two visible seams in the front are not acceptable. Unfortunately (or fortunately), you caught someone like myself in a conundrum because of how well it fits and how inexpensive it is.
summary: Let me break this down for you.

reviewText:
I ordered these Safe Secure Travel Solution Luggage straps right before going on vacation memorial day weekend. This is comparable to something you would find at walmart. The strap band is a rainbow color-- some may not appreciate that with all the controversial issues going on right now but it didn't bother us. The rings on the tags were a little flimsy and I wondered how well they would hold up through the rough handling at the airport but they survived!! The lock was easy to use and we did not have any issues with TSA. I'm pleased with this luggage travel set and would recommend it for others.

I received this free or discounted in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Traveling now is a bit more complicated than its ever been , keeping your items safe and protected is just as important as making sure the safety of others is protected by allowing TSA to do their job . This travel lock set is not only greatly made but also allows TSA to gain access if needed without having to cut your locks or even slice open your bag to gain access. The locks themselves are nice and solid , you can easily set your own code and change it as needed. You get a smaller lock for the zippers and a bigger strap lock to go across the luggage and even help you to identify your bag ( it's a bright rainbow color strap , you'll see it ) I would use both together to help ensure your bag is protected. There are also two thick rubber tags in this set and they have wire rings to attach them to your luggage, these are very sturdy and you won't have to worry about them breaking or getting damaged like the usual paper and fabric tags . I received these for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion of this travel lock set

reviewerName: Heather - Grad Student and Techno Junkie
reviewText:
This kit - two luggage tags, a luggage strap, and a lock - arrived at the perfect time for me. I was preparing for an extended stay abroad and wanted to make sure that my luggage would be secure through the trip. TSA was kind enough to open my bags and, because the lock and strap were TSA approved, they were not broken and my luggage was again locked for travel. The luggage tags are holding up beautiful and the strap and lock still look great.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.

What a great deal! Can't go wrong with this package. Comes with everything you need to protect your precious items from airline travels. A strap with lock to wrap around your suitrcase makes it secure and also easy to identify. Two luggage tags that secure to your luggage with metal loops and a TSA approval lock that fits in your zippers to deter theft. Can't wait to use it on my next trip. These nose rings are the first change for me since my piercing, so keep that in mind with my review. I paid $80 for the post I got my nose pierced with because I wanted to have a back on it. I couldn't believe that most places pierced with no backs so you had to hold your nose ring in showering, coughing etc, or it would blow out! These nose rings are a great value because they do have a flat head on the end so it won't be falling out, so that is a bonus! They are not cheaply made at all. I have the silver one in now and will wear the black with my Harley gear this summer. I do think these are little thicker than the post I had in and a little bigger than I thought they would be, but I have nothing to compare that to as I went from a stud to these rings. I have very sensitive skin so was afraid they would bother me and I haven't had an issue with them at all, yeah! If that changes I will update my review and let you know, but I think it would have happened by now. Great value and quality.

I was very apprehensive before buying this suit, for the reason that there were no reviews on this suit. I read a lot of other MUXILOVE reviews so I knew that I could expect to get a Triangl (or at least very close to) swimsuit. I was very happy and impressed with what I got :).

Sizing: I am a 32A on top, and a 4/6 in pants. Usually I would order a small for the top, and a medium for the bottoms. I read a lot of other MUXILOVE swimsuit rewiews and decided to size up and get a large. The large seems to fit me pretty well for bottoms, but as you can image the top is a little big, but it works.

Color: The color in the picture shown by MUXILOVE seems to be a light pink. When I got it, it was more of neon pink. I don't really mind this, but you should keep this in mind if you are getting the pink swimsuit.

Quality: The neoprene seems to be good quality for the most part. I do not have a real Triangl swimsuit, so I'm not able to compare.

One very important thing is to make sure you're buying it from MUXILOVE-US or MUXILOVE. When you're buying it, it should say Shipped and Sold by MUXILOVE- US. If it doesn't say MUXILOVE, DO NOT BUY IT, you will just get a fake swimsuit.

I purchase a lot of clothing for my grandchildren, and have received the catalogues from the British designer with similar clothes that are so expensive! reviewText:
As soon as I saw this t-shirt I knew I absolutely wanted my son to have it. I just could see him in it... it was love at first sight, literally! :)

I said that it fits as expected... and I guess it does. It is always difficult for me to tell since my son is not even 2 years old, but already wears things for a 3year old... and this is exactly why I bought a size 3T - I just wanted to make sure it would fit good on him and give him some room so that he could grow with/in it and maybe (if it does not get too consumed) even be able to wear it next year as well.

WHAT I LOVE ABOUT THIS SHIRT? Everything! :))) It is cotton! (That is the most important factor - I want my kids to wear good materials in direct contact with their skin). It definitely is well made. The colors are vibrant and happy. The design is super-cute, really adorable! It is an embroidery... the image is actually stitched on the shirt and not printed on it. This is a really good thing: you don't want the image to quickly fade or get destroyed only after a few washes. It should hold up pretty good and (hopefully) for a long time.

WARNING: it does shrink a tiny little bit after the first wash. Depending on how big your kids are, I would try to go one size up (if you don't want the shirt too tight on them).

I love this shirt and knew from the very first moment that I had to have it.. I couldn't resist... this is TOO CUTE. I will definitely buy some more, with different subjects on it. I think that $9.99, for a 3T is a very fair and good price... especially considering that the quality is good, it holds the washing quite well, and it has a beautiful embroidery instead of a classic stamp that fades away quickly or starts to peel off after a couple of times in the washer.
summary: LOVELY - good quality and great design/embroidery.

reviewText:
This is a nice shirt. The boats are all appliques that are sewn securely on to the shirt. Each boat is numbered, so the shirt doubles as counting practice.

I bought a size 4T shirt for my 3.5 year old twins and it seems to fit them just right. They are skinny and slightly tall. I think the fit could change depending on your child's build, but it fits well for us.

It is a soft cotton material. I mean really soft. I want all my own shirts to be THIS soft. My kids actually fight over it since we only have one "boat shirt".

I just put it through it's first wash after being worn and it held up well to washing. There was no immediate wear or any issues with the stitching that I could see. This is great because it held up better than some more expensive name brands I have purchased in the past.

 I did notice that there seems to be stitching outside of the boats (see photo) and I would like the shirt a bit more if the stitching on the appliques was a bit more accurately placed.

It has two buttons on one side, so you can easily slip the shirt over your child's head. I love this feature in kids shirts. My kids don't like it when their shirt is hard to pull over their head. The button accent also looks really nice.

I am very happy with my discounted purchase of this summer boat counting shirt. This is my unbiased opinion of the shirt after using and wearing the shirt.

reviewText: Beautiful

My husband has a pair of Oakley Fast Jacket XL glasses that he loves!  After wearing them for a few years, the lenses were beginning to scratch so I decided to try ordering a new set of lenses for his frames.  Although my husband would never choose the color pink for anything, I did order the lenses in the pink mirrorshield, because looking at the photos, the pink had the most iridescent look, which he typically likes in a set of lenses.  When the lenses arrived, I was happy to see that they, in fact, did not look girly pink.  He loved them!  They fit nicely into his original frames and were easy to install.  The view out of the lenses provides a grey/blue tint.  I wish they were polarized, but I knew when I ordered them they were not, so no star deduction for that.  Also, included with the lenses was a nice cleaning cloth.  Great purchase at a fraction of the cost of Oakley brand lenses!

reviewText:
I received this product free or at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. I tend to read and base my purchases on customer reviews, therefore, I am very open and honest with my opinions. My rating of this product was in no way, shape, or form influenced by the seller.

I am reviewing the Rose Red pouch (exactly as described and showcased on Amazon); I absolutely love the color and the pouch itself. It is high density waterproof nylon travel wallet that zips closed; it has a detachable hand strap and it is light weight and easy to carry in hand, on wrist, in purse or suitcase, etc.  There are 4 inside compartments (1 has a zipper), 1 outside pocket, 6 bank card pockets and a pen holder.
Easily holds several documents; multiple passports, IDs, credit/debit cards, cash, several normal sized sheets of paper folded in half, smartphone, planner, a pen, and still had room for more. The inside zippered section is where I kept the cash and anything that I didn't want lose in the pouch. It is extremely helpful for traveling and organization; I think staying organized while traveling is difficult and this is a life saver for me. I did carry it while there was a torrential down pour and I am extremely happy to report that the rain did not seep through or get anything on the inside wet.

I absolutely recommend this pouch to anyone looking for a safe, convenient, waterproof way of carrying important documents and such while on the go.

If my review was helpful to you, please vote, yes. I am always honest with my opinion and do my best to focus on points that a potential customer may find helpful when contemplating a purchase.
summary: I absolutely recommend this pouch to anyone looking for a safe, convenient, waterproof way of carrying important items on the go

reviewText: How exciting to have received a discount to review this item right in time for my guys' daughters to go on their first vacation requiring a passport ~ I of course had to open it and check it out & now am thinking it would make a perfect accessory to my own collection of purses, clutches and wallets buuut... They are super excited and this will make a trip that's already full of such excitement all the better!  The pockets are deep enough to hold several items yet don't stretch so much that I would worry any of their documents, money or collectibles could go missing. I think it's the perfect size for her phone too which is wonderful because I can't wait to see pictures of their first trip out of the country! Thank you so much for offering a discount in exchange for my fair and honest review! Great item, solid/durable stitching, professional & fun looking and seems like a perfect "Have a great trip" accessory!
summary: Thank you for making their first out of country trip that much better!

reviewText:
The Travel Clutch bag is 9.9 x 6.2 x 1.3 inches and is quite roomy inside. The loop handle is quite convenient in case I have to carry it separately and hold my daughter at the same time. The Clutch is well made and the fabric is nice. It is lined to make it waterproof and this is very beneficial when carrying important papers that are hard to replace quickly. I has a pocket on the outside and inside it has a pen holder, a zippered pocket and an open pocket on one side and a couple on the other side, and a place for credit/ID cards. The colors they come in are nice. I ordered the pink one for my daughter's papers. I do not expect to be able to travel anywhere outside the USA. But might have to hurry and take off if we have to evacuate for a hurricane. In this case I needed something ready with our papers and info in it. With my daughter's being pink and mine a different color, it will be easy to know which is which and can grab and throw into our bug out bags. This Travel Clutch is great for keeping me organized. I have her birth certificate, insurance card, shot records, emergency numbers and contacts, and other important papers for her all in one place. I have this in the locked file cabinet, but now it is easy to grab and go for an important appointment or for bugging out(because we never know with hurricanes). I am really happy with this Travel Clutch and hope I do not need to grab it to evacuate, but if we have to our papers are ready. I am very happy.

reviewText: I used this for transporting documents on a recent 3-week trip overseas. this clutch was perfect for holding copies of my invitation letter, passport, itinerary, proof of vaccination, etc. I love the many pockets and even the interior zippered section. Every document had a section that it could be stored in. This made it very easy and convenient while going through the airport, customs, or speaking with officials about my purpose of travel. I love the bright color too which made it easy to identify and locate in my purse. Plus, the front pocket was a nice feature for holding my boarding pass or luggage receipts, along with my passport while going through various levels of security. I knew that I had all of my documents with me with this clutch, and that made for a stress-free and convenient day of travel. This was hands-down the best clutch for storing all of my travel documents-- especially for extended travel overseas. I don't plan to ever leave home without it!

reviewText: Great little item.

This clutch is perfect for keeping all of your important travel documents together in one safe place. There is plenty of room inside, and the different compartments make it easy to keep it all organized.  You can fit your passport, credit cards, license, ID, travel info papers, cash, your phone, anything! The zippers both work fine, the condition of the clutch was great, and the shipping was quick. I am really glad I had the opportunity to buy this product at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review, because I was looking into purchasing one anyways. I would definitely recommend this to any traveler as a convenient way to keep everything together and safe. It makes my life so much easier!

I didn't have a need for a clutch bag for a passport, but it looked like it would be a great clutch for my needs.  I was right! This bag holds my phone and my Kindle Fire along with other storage for any items you don't want to be without. I am quite addicted to audio books and with this clutch, I can I throw in my Kindle Fire, and my phone and hit the trail when walking my dog.  It has a pocket on the outside where I can put my phone and it is handy and simple to get at.  When you open it, there are 3 pockets on each side. There is a mesh pocket area on each side that is the size of the clutch height. One side has a zippered area that is also large, running the entire half of the clutch. It has a zipper that encloses the entire thing and a small handle so you can keep it on you at all times. I have bluetooth headphones that fit nicely. There are endless possibilities of what you can stuff inside this great clutch when you head out the door.  If I am heading to the casino, I can leave a big bulky purse at home but have what I need with me.  This was a great find for my needs.

I had the chance to receive this clutch at a reduced cost for my honest review.  I love this clutch. I will probably get another one as a gift for my bff.

I really like this product. It's a good clutch or huge wallet to keep things organized. I think it's not just for travel, you could use this for school, or if you work on the go. I like that it can fit a mini sketchbook I have and a pencil, also my phone, money and cards. The look it's neutral and unisex so it's not embarrassing for a guy to carry. I carried it like a clutch but I was able to fit it in the large back pocket of my partner's jeans (it sticks out). I like the material it's a blue canvas. There's no flaw in the construction and I like the detachable wrist strap. The only reason that I'm giving this 4 stars and not 5 is because it doesn't look exactly like the photos. It has a noticeable logo on the bottom front (where the diagonal front pocket is). None of the photos have that and the logo detracts from the aesthetic. I feel like they should use real photos of the product and not a stock image o at the very least maybe photoshop the logo into the picture so it matches what you're going to get.

I purchased this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.
summary: Very useful and good looking except for the logo

reviewText:
WINCAN Hand Strap Travel Passport Wallet

---BLUE---
Overall:
I'm not used to carrying around these types of organizers, but this one is great/useful. Used it most when we were at the airport fighting our way through security. Normally, I would have my wallet in my left jean pocket, keys in my right, and smartphone in my back pocket. On top of that, drivers license and boarding ticket in hand. Then I would end up having to empty all that out into the plastic bins to run through the x-ray machine.. just to pick it all back up and dig them bag into my various pockets.
Once we got to the airport, I put everything I immediately needed on hand into this pouch. As we were herded through security, I just dropped it into the bin and picked it back up again. So easy.
It looks very casual  Im not one to be wearing suits all the time. So, for me it works. It helps organize a lot when travelling. The strap is a little tight for my wrist, probably because Im a guy. I got the blue one and the color is exactly how it looks in the Amazon pictures. I like the red accents.
*Some of the colors may be off in the pictures because of the lighting. The blue is accurately portrayed in the Amazon pictures.

Quality:
The build quality/material is pretty good. Its made of waterproof nylon. I would say, it would works pretty good against rain, just don't completely submerge it. The one I received didn't have a lot of loose threads or didn't seem like it would get caught on anything and tear. Inside pockets and mesh come in very handy, especially if you're like me and you love having lots of pockets. You can really fit a lot into this, passports, cards, smartphones, slim planners and it even has a pen loop.

PROS:
-Lots of pockets
-Waterproof material
-Wrist strap

CONS:
-None to mention at this time

Conclusion:
Good quality travel pouch with LOTS of pockets

---ORANGE---
(written by my wife)
Travelus bag (5/5)

Overall: I purchased a product from Travelus before and it is great. And here I am with another product!!! Its in pumpkin or orange-ish copper color: well made and doesnt feel cheap at all.

Pros:
The fabric is great. Water droplets stay on for some time on the surface, so you can simply shake off the bag to remove the liquid (if something spilled or just rain). Unless its submerged under water, I don't think it will get wet easily.
Many inside pockets of different sizes: there are big mesh pockets on both sides, showing whats inside, and a zipper compartment for double security.
Theres a half-pocket on the outside for an easy access (good for receipts and tickets).

Cons:
Wristband is hooked to the zipper; so if the bag gets caught, the zipper might break apart or open up the bag. I haven't tried pulling the wristband hard from the zipper, but its made of steel, so it shouldnt be a major problem.
summary: Neat little travel pouch to carry most essentials

I absolutely LOVE this passport clutch!!

We travel often as a family of four (two kids under the age of 3) so I have a lot to carry around and I never feel organized enough. This clutch is the definition of convenient organization. There are tons of compartments on the left side, right side and even a compartment in the front. I was able to easily hold four passports, a long marriage certificate (without it bending), IDs, bank cards, cash, a pen and sanitizing wipes with plenty of room to spare. It has a zipper section inside the case that is perfect for cash and other valuables. That particular compartment makes the entire clutch expandable so you can carry even more things in the case to have them handy at all times. It even has a long handle so you can hang it from a suitcase and it's still handy.

Prior to this, I used a regular clutch. Every Time I was at the TSA line and boarding the plane it was a huge mess to get four people's passports and tickets out and together without frantically looking through an organized clutch and trying to grow two more hands. This makes those moments a million times easier. It is very durable and and water doesn't seep through to the stuff inside. I highly recommend this passport clutch, especially if you have problems with organization, a big family, or simply travel a lot. (Or all three! lol). It's great. By the way, I got this passport clutch at a discounted price for a fair and unbiased review. This is one of the most useful things I have received yet!

These are not all stainless steel. The bar that goes into your nose is, but the jewelry part is not. It WILL corrode in your body. They look great, they're beautiful, however they are not body safe. This product should be pulled from Amazon.

My mom got me these last Christmas and when I saw them on here I felt like I had to say something - these are super cute and really pretty if you like decorative septum rings, but the material is questionable! They say stainless steel here but mine discolored within a couple weeks of wear :( it happens more around the areas that come into contact with your skin (so the area right around the actual clicker, and the decorative bits that hang a bit lower and get brushed by your lips, etc) so if you don't mind that they're okay, but it ALWAYS bums me out when my jewelry discolors, especially when its supposedly made of stainless steel. That being said, my very sensitive skin didn't have any negative reaction to it, which is better than discoloration and a reaction, I suppose. Beware of costume jewelry metal!

reviewText: Great gift!

It is soft and light to the touch. It enhances the colors in the dress I'm wearing to my son's wedding. I couldn't be any more excited with this purchase.
I wish that there had been washing/care directions in English.

The product arrived quickly and overall I love it! It is nice lightweight material that is soft and didn't have any smells.  I bought the purple and I would say that the photo accurately represents the color of the scarf. It is a blue toned purple which is very unique an pretty. Most purples I see lean more towards a lighter lilac color.  This purple has more of a punch.  The dye job isn't completely even but I think it gives the scarf kind of an ombre look and makes it more interesting and not flat. There is a pattern on the edges of the scarf which adds a nice feminine detail. The pattern goes around the entire scarf and it is of lace hearts. The edge detail isn't flimsy and it has held up well. Usually I worry about lace detail ripping but I don't with this scarf.  It is nicely finished around the edges.  The fabric itself hasn't snagged which is something that I worry a lot about with scarves like this.  This scarf is perfect for spring/summer and I could see myself attaching it to my bag for when it gets cooler in the evening.  It is also large enough to be used as a beach coverup.  But keep in mind that the fabric is sheer.  As an added bonus the scarf came with a cute little bracelet that I thought was a nice touch.  Overall I love the scarf and am thinking about ordering it in blue.  I also think this would make a great inexpensive gift for someone.

I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

This scarf is so lovely and soft. I really didn't expect it to be so soft! I bought the purple color and it is just so lovely. It has a really pretty heart design in the lace edging which really adds to the overall design of the scarf. It is also very generously sized. I am planning to keep this scarf in my diaper bag to use as a nursing cover when I am out in public with my infant. It is very thin so we will not be too hot when I have us covered which I really like. The scarf came with a lovely little carrying bag and a cute little bracelet as well which were a nice touch that would make this a really nice and thoughtful gift. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review.

reviewText:
This wrap is absolutely beautiful. The color was accurate to the photos. The size is surprisingly large, it often seems like most items ordered online are smaller than they seem, but not this one (The measurements are accurate). Everything about this item was quality. From the heavy plastic bag it came in, the cording instead of plastic holding the tags on, the reusable gift bag included, the small free gift thrown in (mine was a beautiful beaded bracelet) to the actual wrap itself. The beautiful lacing around the edge is stretch and the whole wrap, including the lace, is snuggly soft. I look forward to using this accessory often. It is great for dressing up or casual. Again, not only is the wrap beautiful and quality but the whole presentation is one of quality. I am quite impressed that the company took the the initiative to make every aspect speak to the quality of their products. LOVE IT!
*I received this item at a discount for my review. It is against Amazon's policy to "buy" good reviews however and any seller attempting to bribe for stars can be removed from Amazon. Take comfort in that my integrity and my love of Amazon will not allow me to post a dishonest review. After all, I shop here too and rely on others honest reviews when I myself am purchasing items. Therefore I strive to make MY reviews an honest and clear assessment of the products.

reviewText:
I am really pleased with this scarf. It's a very good length. I'm 5'9", and the scarf reaches mid-thigh if I just hang it from my neck and center it. I was really concerned because of the petite model, but it's a great size. Even my husband was surprised.

It is also INCREDIBLY soft. I'm sure with washing it will get even softer, but it is already buttery. It feels a bit like a thin pashmina as far as softness. It's a perfect weight for summer. The weave is delicate enough that it's feminine, but not so delicate I feel like it will need babied.

The apricot color is a nice, soft, peachy color; not quite yellow, not quite pink. It's really feminine and neutral enough you could pair it with lots of colors.

I'm not a HUGE fan of the heart motif on the lace around the wrap, but it is not a big enough issue to take away a star.

Very pleased and am seriously considering getting a couple other colors too.

*I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review*

reviewText: Horrible. Material is thin and see through. You got what you pay for.

This set fits so awkwardly - I got an xs. The top is too small and shows too much side boob. I am a 30D, 5'5 about a 23 inch waiste. The bottom fits my hips and thighs, but has about a four inch gap between my waiste and the skirt. I wore the skirt with a different crop top, and received a compliment from every girl at the barbecue. Within three hours of my first wear, I noticed there was a four inch slit in the seam at my thigh. I would recommend this set for someone with a small cup size and maybe 26 inch waiste? Overall though, I wouldn't recommend - the material is thin and transparent.

I'll start off by saying that this outfit is very cute, trendy, and I intend to wear it often in summer weather. The pattern is true to the image and it fits as expected. I'm pleased to have purchased it, especially for under ten bucks.

On the down side, the off-white fabric is thin, and as a result, it's about 5-10% translucent. On the skirt, that's no big deal -- if somebody can faintly see my white undies, I can live with that. The top, however, is a different matter. The top is not constructed in a way that allows for a bra; even some of my backless stick-on bras wouldn't work, because they stick out the sides. Yet, going without a bra more or less means flashing your nips at anyone who looks.

Fortunately, I have access to a sewing machine and some scrap fabric, so I was able to spend some time sewing another layer of simple fabric into the inside of the top. The extra lining totally solved my transparency issue, and I'll be able to wear it without worry. However, anyone who isn't able to make an alteration like this will be in a trickier position.
summary: Very cute outfit, but fabric is too thin to wear without alterations

There are a couple things about this that I really like. First, It looks fantastic under form fitting dresses with slits up the back. I'm not a huge fan of slits and love that this covers that gap in a very fun and sexy way.

Second, I found it fit well. I haven't measured in the last two weeks, but my hips were around 40 inches and this fit nicely over my hips. I was almost surprised  because everyone said it ran small but I don't go by the size, I ALWAYS check the posted measurements when shopping from amazon.

I do wish that the straps were adjustable because I found they slid up and the top ended up going way too high for my liking. Even so, I was able to work around this and enjoy that the slip worked wonderfully for it's intended purpose. The lace material is NOT stretchy so plan to follow the hip measurement more than the bust one.

Overall, I didn't find this the prettiest to look at, but LOVE how it looks under a dress. I wish that the straps were longer, but enjoy how it functions, for the most part. This is a fun slip and I really enjoy it!

I received this slip for free for my honest and unbiased review.

But based on the material, quality of how it's sewn together, and how surprisingly flattering it is, so far it's a very good two-piece bathing suit. Shopping for bathing suits if you aren't a Sports Illustrated model is always a matter of finding something that both doesn't make you look horrible and isn't embarrassing, especially if you don't like flashing a lot of skin. I did complain (a little) about how long shipping took, but the seller says they will be using a faster method in the future. Fair enough. Speed vs. shipping costs are always going to be toss up. You can always go for expedited if you need something faster. I feel I got my money's worth.

reviewText: I love this necklace. It is a perfect fit and looks great on. It is not heavy as some are.. It has a small amount of sparkle and goes with anything.

I ordered the Fashion Luxury White Gold Plated with Czech Diamond Waltz Silver White necklace and it came quickly.  It was bubble wrapped tightly in a small envelope.  It is a stunning necklace in my opinion and very classy looking.  This necklace will compliment anything that you want to dress up.  The necklace definately adds sparkle and glitz to your outfit.  There is some weight to the necklace and design so it is not flimsy and cheap looking.  I had no problems with my chain it layed  perfectly flat and I was not readjusting it. Overall, it is a inexpensive necklace and very affordable.  I had no sensitivity to the metal in necklace at all.  I just dressed up and wore it too a birthday party an received a lot of compliments.  Overall, I would recommend this necklace to add to your collection.  I did receive this necklace at a discounted rate for a honest review.

I love this necklace. It has a classy look  when worn alone, or casual when worn with others in combination. The Fashion Luxury White Gold Plated with Czech Diamond Waltz Sliver White Jewelry Set Necklace is a bit short on me,  but you could add an extender if you wanted. I do no like anything close to my neck as I feel like I am choking. I miss that it has a little ring on the end for hooking into, it's just chain. I don't believe it's sterling, so depending on your skin, it may wear over time. That doesn't usually happen for me unless I wear something that isn't sterling every day for a very long period. I can't say if that would be the case here or not. It's a heavy snaky chain, and the jeweled part lays nice and flat, never twisting, which I find to be a real plus, unlike some loose pendants. I'm giving 4 stars strictly for the lack of the little ring to hook the clasp into, because I found it difficult to hook without it. I received this product at a reduced price or free in exchange for my review of the Fashion Luxury White Gold Plated with Czech Diamond Waltz Sliver White Jewelry Set Necklace.

The necklace is simple yet pretty. It gives off some sparkle but is not garish. It's versatile in that it can be worn for both casual and dressier occasions. The necklace is all one piece. It's not a pendant on a chain. The chain seems pretty sturdy. As for quality, it's really hard to tell at this point. I'll have to have had and worn it for awhile to know how well it holds up. Right now it's clean and shiny looking. It has no stamp on it anywhere to indicate that it's plated. I do hope it stays nice. This is something I can wear with many different outfits. The centerpiece lays flat against the skin. All the stones are set nicely. The chain is a bit short, as others have indicated but that's no problem for me. I have extenders iI can use if I want a longer look. This isn't fine top notch jewelry. But for what it is, it's pretty nice. It arrived securely packaged and wrapped in bubble wrap. I had no idea what to expect with this purchase. It was a gamble. Now I can say that I am glad I got this. Fingers crossed that it endures well.

The photos of this scarf do not do it justice...AT ALL! It is just so beautiful that it is one of those must see with your own eyes to truly see the  beauty of this piece. I ordered the purple scarf and it is GORGEOUS! The color is a muted tone of purple that actually looks like rose or a dark blush and you can see the swirls of dye that make this scarf so interesting and pretty. The stitching is even and well done all the way around the scarf. There is not a stitch out of place or a loose thread. This scarf is 74"58" and  is so large you could tie this numerous ways and have an infinite amount of looks with this one scarf. It also came with a few surprises packed inside as well, so you are not just getting the scarf, but 2 bags, 1 cloth like tote bag and 1 thick plastic zip top bag for travel or maybe to put the scarf away when not in use. There is also a handpainted porcelain necklace.
This is such a large scarf that I tied it as a halter dress and it fit very comfortably with room to spare. I'm 5'7" and my measurements are 43"bust(full)/35" waist (natural)/45" hips (full). This falls to the tops of my feet tied as a halter dress around my neck. You could also double it up and tie as a sarong skirt for a swimsuit coverup. There are endless fashion ideas that the size and look of this scarf would be perfect. I'm so glad I ordered this and I can see getting quite a few more! My wish is that more colors would be added so I can order them all!
The quality is wonderful, it is not cheap looking at all. There is no care tag or tag stating materials, but it feels like silk or at least a well made polyester. There are two tags attached written in Chinese, Japanese, or Korean that give the name of the company. I will hand wash with a delicate soap to see how that works and just hang to dry. It is soft and sheer as well as being lightweight. Perfect for all the beautiful romantic flowing boho looks for this summer! It would make a great shawl tied around your shoulders while wearing a satiny slip dress and a pair of heeled sandals...or tied at the end a discount slipped over your neck and worn as a vest over crocheted shorts and a cute camisole. That's just off the top of my head. I really don't think you will be disappointed if you are looking for a large scarf with some versatility....this would be the one to order.

reviewText: I'm loving this. Thank you

While I love the color (colors) of this scarf,  I am challenged by how to wear it. I am slowly coming to get used to it.
It is just huge!
The texture, when I first received it, was not as soft, and the flow not as fluid as I generally look for in a scarf.
Having said all that, let me tell you a little more about the scarf itself.
I got the blue one, and the colors and shading are very nice, very well blended. The shades vary from light to mid blue, no darks here with this scarf. The pattern is sort of a subtle tie dyed look.
The edges of the scarf look to be rolled and stitched, about 1/16" wide, and the stitches are even, a good job, with no loose ends that I could find.
It does not have a fabric content label, but I believe it is a lightweight (feather weight?) polyester.  I washed it in a garment bag in the clothes washer with no ill effect. I used the delicate cycle, with woolite, and added just a tiny bit of fabric softener. It came out a little bit softer than it was before the wash, and the edge stitching held up perfectly. I washed it alone, in case it would bleed any color, but I'm glad to say I don't believe that was an issue.
The colors were just as rich as they were before I washed the scarf, and I simply hung it to dry. It was a breezy day, which pulled out the few wrinkles that it picked up during the spin cycle.
If you wanted to, I think you could dry it on extra low by itself for a short spell, and it would come out just as well.
Of course, you could also hand wash it, but I take the shortcuts where I can find them, especially when it comes to laundry!
The size of the scarf (77" x 57") is more the size of a sarong (I have a bunch of those) but the sheer nature of the scarf prohibits wearing as a sarong, unless, of course, you are using it as a bathing suit cover - up. It is absolutely prefect for that purpose, and I have found it to be great as a shawl, but I am still struggling to find a way to wear it as a scarf without  having it look too bulky.
I have a ton of scarves, though, so I don't necessarily need another like I already have. I am liking this as a shawl, or a cover - up. Maybe a scarf...but I'm not quite there yet.

reviewText:
I received these socks free in exchange for a fair and honest review. I gifted these socks to a young man who is 21 years old and he was super excited to receive them. He loves the colors, the fit and the variety. He has worn a pair daily for several weeks and they have held up well in the wash. He has size 10 or 11 feet and they fit fine, they don't slip off and they are holding up well. He's as hard on his socks any a teenager is, and often runs the house in just his sock feet. They are color fast and haven't bled at all.

Overall I would say they are a great deal for the price, and a great quality too. The young man who received them was more than pleased with them and I would definitely purchase them in the future. They are as good as any name brand ankle sock, and twice as cute with the vibrant colors!
summary: Cute colors, quality socks and a great price!!

reviewText:
I love these Unisex Low Cut No Show Ankle Casual Athletic Quarter Socks by Formeu. These socks are very good quality. They are made from 75% cotton, 23% polyester, and 2% spandex. They are soft and stretchy. I got the ones that are several different colors with stripes around the middle of the foot. The colors are bright and they are so pretty!

They are unisex but I got them for myself. I wear a size 8 to 9 shoe and I love how these socks fit. My right foot is always swollen due to CRPS and it can be hard to find comfortable socks that aren't too tight. These socks are comfortable and I have a little room in them. The toe area does not have a thick uncomfortable seam. These socks are perfect for me. They are breathable, help keep my sweaty feet dry, and also help keep them from smelling too bad. There are 5 pairs of socks rolled up and in a nice box that makes then easy to gift if you choose to give them to someone. I love these socks and would definitely recommend them.

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are based on my own experiences.
summary: I love these Unisex Low Cut Casual Athletic Quarter Socks!

reviewText:
These socks come nicely folded in a rectangular box, their colors showing.  These are definitely catchy socks.  I've now worn two pair during 6-mile hikes, one in boots and one in my sandals and both pair held up without any signs of weakening at the seams.  They didn't stink although they were slightly damp. The socks I've already washed also show no color fade, either.

These are comfy socks that fit my size 8.5 feet well.  No bunching, no sliding.  They stay up!  These are thin socks so they will probably last through this year, as I'm hard on my socks with all the active stuff I do outside.

I received a free sample in exchange for a review.

These low-cut socks have been an excellent acquisition. I like them on a number of levels... comfort, size, fit, and color.

I wear around a size 7.5 shoes, and often socks tend to run a bit large. As such, the heels sometimes end up around the achillies tendon. Not so with these. The heel and toe placement sit perfectly, and there's no bunching during use. They're a little on the thinner side while still remaining soft. I wouldn't use these for major heavy-duty workouts like long walks or running, but they are perfect for knocking around the house or regular daily use. And the colors... gotta love the playfulness of the color combinations. They definitely beat my normal white or black anklet socks. :)

These are a good deal, and you'll enjoy wearing them.

Disclosure:
Obtained From: Formeu
Payment: Free
summary: I like these socks a lot!
